media.description: Not long after Ash won his Icicle Badge at the Snowpoint Gym, his rival Paul challenged Gym Leader Candice to a battle!

media.title: Pillars of Friendship!
media.description: Ash and his friends join Brandon in his flying Battle Pyramid and head for Snowpoint Temple, where something sinister is afoot.

media.title: Frozen on the Tracks!
media.description: Ash, Dawn, and Brock are on a train, headed for Ash’s big battle at Lake Acuity.

media.title: Pedal to the Mettle!
media.description: Lake Acuity is said to be the home of Uxie, the Legendary Pokémon, but today it's home to a 6-on-6 battle between Ash and Paul!

media.title: Evolving Strategies!
media.description: The Lake Acuity showdown between Ash and Paul continues with a face-off between Pikachu and Magmortar!

media.title: Uncrushing Defeat!
media.description: After losing a tough battle against Paul, Ash and his Pokémon are recovering at the Pokémon Center near Lake Acuity.

media.title: Promoting Healthy Tangrowth!
media.description: The Lilypad Contest is coming up, and Dawn wants Mamoswine to learn some Contest moves.

media.title: Beating the Bustle and Hustle!
media.description: As our heroes continue their journey to Lilypad Town and Dawn's next Pokémon Contest, a stopover in Greenstation Town reveals a competition called the "Sinnoh Pokémon Hustle," where trainers and their Pokémon compete on various challenging stages.

media.title: Gateway to Ruin!
media.description: Traversing Mt. Coronet on their way to Lilypad Town and Dawn’s next Contest, our heroes discover a lost pink Shellos!

media.title: Three Sides to Every Story!
media.description: On their way to Lilypad Town and Dawn’s upcoming Pokémon Contest, our heroes are delighted to come across a beautiful berry orchard!

media.title: Strategy Begins at Home!
media.description: Arriving at Dawn’s home in Twinleaf Town, Dawn’s mother Johanna is in the process of planning the town festival’s events along with Izzy and Cara.

media.title: A Faux Oak Finish!
media.description: It’s the first day of the Twinleaf Festival, and Professor Oak is scheduled to give a lecture on “the interrelation of Pokémon and Evolutionary stones.”

media.title: Historical Mystery Tour!
media.description: The Twinleaf Festival is coming to a close, but before the event can end, there’s still some unfinished business!

media.title: Challenging a Towering Figure!
media.description: As the Twinleaf Festival winds down, our heroes participate in the Twinleaf Festival Challenge. The winner gets to battle against Tower Tycoon Palmer!

media.title: Where No Togepi Has Gone Before!
media.description: Blast into space aboard a rocket ship with Ash, his pals, and Team Rocket!

media.title: An Egg Scramble!
media.description: As our heroes continue toward Lilypad Town and Dawn’s next Pokémon Contest, an unexpected stop in a small village brings surprising new friends...and a Johto festival!

media.title: Gone with the Windworks!
media.description: Dawn's Marill is on the loose again, and this time it's wound up inside the Valley Windworks power plant!

media.title: A Rivalry to Gible On!
media.description: As Dawn’s next Pokémon Contest in Lilypad Town draws near, our heroes, along with Lyra and Khoury, cross paths with an ornery, powerful, irresistible Gible!

media.title: Dressed for Jess Success!
media.description: The time for the Lilypad Town Pokémon Contest is finally here, but an out-of-sorts Jessilina forces James and Meowth to take emergency action!

media.title: Bagged Then Tagged!
media.description: Ash and Dawn are preparing to have a Double Battle with their friends Lyra and Khoury, but Team Rocket has other plans!

media.title: Try For the Family Stone!
media.description: Continuing to Sunyshore City and Ash’s next Sinnoh Gym Battle, our heroes come across brother-and-sister Trainers with troubling family issues!

media.title: Sticking with Who You Know!
media.description: Continuing toward Sunyshore City and Ash’s next Gym Battle, everything stops when Pikachu and Piplup become stuck on each other...literally!

media.title: Unlocking the Red Chain of Events!
media.description: While our heroes take a break on their way to Sunyshore City, they again cross paths with Team Galactic, whose evil plans finally begin to reveal themselves!

media.title: The Needs of the Three!
media.description: Now that Team Galactic’s evil plans are in place, is there any way our heroes can possibly stop them?

media.title: The Battle Finale of Legend!
media.description: As our heroes continue their battle against Team Galactic and its quest to build a new world order, the fate of the Sinnoh region and the entire world hangs in the balance!

media.title: The Treasure Is All Mine!
media.description: When our heroes discover a buried treasure chest in the forest, little do they realize the disaster that waits for them inside it!

media.title: Mastering Current Events!
media.description: On the way to Dawn’s next Pokémon Contest in Daybreak Town, our heroes meet an Air Battle Master, who presents Ash’s Gliscor with a challenge...and an opportunity!

media.title: Double-Time Battle Training!
media.description: As Dawn prepares for her Double Battle Contest in Daybreak Town, a little help from her friends brings some new and surprising inspiration!

media.title: A Meteoric Rise to Excellence!
media.description: As they continue toward Daybreak Town and Dawn’s next Pokémon Contest, our heroes come across an elderly woman training an Altaria, which Team Rocket has its eyes on stealing.

media.title: Gotta Get a Gible!
media.description: As Daybreak Town and Dawn’s next Pokémon Contest gets closer, Gible decides to pay our heroes a return visit, but plays suspiciously hard to get!

title: Pokémon: DP Sinnoh League Victors
description: Ash and friends’ adventure through the Sinnoh region reaches its end in Pokémon: DP Sinnoh League Victors, now on Pokémon TV!

media.title: Regaining the Home Advantage!
media.description: Daybreak Town and Dawn’s next Pokémon Contest are within reach, but first our heroes must confront a mysteriously angry Magnezone and Metagross, who threaten an entire town!

media.title: Short and to the Punch!
media.description: On the trek toward Daybreak Town and Dawn’s next Pokémon Contest, our heroes meet a Pokémon martial artist who has a valuable lesson for Ash!

media.title: A Marathon Rivalry!
media.description: Our heroes discover a Trainer with a style much different from Ash’s, as demonstrated in a unique competition that compares the difference!

media.title: Yes, in Dee Dee, It's Dawn!
media.description: Having arrived in Daybreak Town for her next Pokémon Contest, Dawn bumps into a past rival waiting to challenge her...and the rest of our heroes find out something about Dawn's past, as well!

media.title: Playing the Performance Encore!
media.description: As the Daybreak Town Pokémon Contest continues, the makings of a fierce rivalry are taking shape!

media.title: Fighting Ire With Fire!
media.description: Team Rocket devises a new strategy to catch Pikachu, Piplup, and Empoleon. As a result, Ash’s Monferno responds to the dire situation in a fiery and unexpected way!

media.title: Piplup, Up and Away!
media.description: Piplup keeps getting hit with Gible’s Draco Meteor, and it decides enough is enough!

media.title: Flint Sparks the Fire!
media.description: When Ash arrives at the Sunyshore Gym for his next Gym battle, its uninspired Gym Leader refuses to accept his challenge!

media.title: The Fleeing Tower of Sunyshore!
media.description: Team Rocket wants to steal Sunyshore Tower…and comes up with a novel way to do just that!

media.title: Teaching the Student Teacher!
media.description: When our heroes agree to be substitute teachers for Dawn’s mother Johanna, one of their students winds up teaching Dawn a valuable lesson!

media.title: Pokémon Ranger: Heatran Rescue!
media.description: As our heroes continue toward Lake Valor and the Grand Festival, they come across a determined, upbeat Pokémon Ranger on a mission to capture a rare Heatran!

media.title: Keeping in Top Forme!
media.description: Before Ash and the gang can make it to the Grand Festival, they come across a mysterious girl with a sick Shaymin in need of assistance!

media.title: An Elite Coverup!
media.description: As our heroes attempt to help a young Trainer named Ian recover his stolen Pokémon, they discover his mentor is none other than Bertha of the Elite Four!

media.title: Dawn of a Royal Day!
media.description: On their way to the Grand Festival, our heroes are befriended by a royal princess with a familiar face...and an unusual request!

media.title: With the Easiest of Grace!
media.description: As the Grand Festival approaches, Dawn discovers her newly acquired Togekiss has a unique approach to battling!

media.title: Dealing with a Fierce Double Ditto Drama!
media.description: On their way to Lake Valor and the Grand Festival, our heroes come across a seemingly tough Trainer with a pair of incredible Ditto!

media.title: Last Call—First Round!
media.description: It’s the opening of the Grand Festival, and the first round is an amazing array of faces, both new and familiar!

media.title: Opposites Interact!
media.description: The Battle Stage of the Grand Festival is under way, and the first pairing is none other than Dawn and her feisty rival, Ursula!

media.title: Coming Full-Festival Circle!
media.description: As the field competing in the Grand Festival gets whittled down, some very familiar faces emerge for the final pairings!

media.title: A Grand Fight for Winning!
media.description: Get ready for the final round of the Grand Festival, where Dawn and Zoey prepare to face off!

media.title: For the Love of Meowth!
media.description: While our heroes have their sights set on the Sunyshore Gym and Ash’s next Gym Battle, a certain Pokémon has its sights set on something completely different!

media.title: The Eighth Wonder of the Sinnoh World!
media.description: With the battle for Ash’s eighth Gym Badge at hand, Volkner promises a challenge for our hero like none he has faced before!

media.title: Four Roads Diverged in a Pokémon Port!
media.description: For our heroes, the road to the Sinnoh League suddenly becomes a trip down memory lane with a group of old friends!

media.title: Bucking the Treasure Trend!
media.description: As our heroes continue their trek via ferry to the Sinnoh League, they come across a most unusual treasure hunter—out on a most unusual treasure hunt!

media.title: An Old Family Blend!
media.description: As the Sinnoh League gets under way at Lily Of The Valley Island, Ash encounters some unexpected challenges while deciding which Pokémon to use!

media.title: League Unleashed!
media.description: In the opening round of the Sinnoh League at Lily Of The Valley Island, it’s Ash versus Nando!

media.title: Casting a Paul on Barry!
media.description: Ash is on his way to a third-round battle with Conway at the Sinnoh League Tournament, but first he and the gang take time to watch Barry’s battle with Paul!

media.title: Working on a Right Move!
media.description: It’s Ash versus Conway in their Round Three match at the Sinnoh League, and their battle styles couldn’t be more different!

media.title: Familiarity Breeds Strategy!
media.description: As the Sinnoh League quarterfinals get under way, an old rivalry is reignited when Ash goes up against Paul in their second full battle!

media.title: A Real Rival Rouser!
media.description: As the Sinnoh League quarterfinals continue, the battle between Ash and Paul brings their rivalry to levels previously only imagined!

media.title: Battling a Thaw in Relations!
media.description: The quarterfinal battle between Ash and Paul is building to a fever pitch, revealing surprising emotions between the two Trainers!

media.title: The Semi-Final Frontier!
media.description: As Ash begins his semifinal battle against Tobias, he discovers that his opponent is not to be taken lightly!

media.title: The Brockster Is In!
media.description: As our heroes make their way to Twinleaf Town via ferryboat, a group of injured Pokémon challenges Brock to practice new skills!

media.title: Memories Are Made of Bliss!
media.description: Spending time at Dawn’s house in Twinleaf Town before going their separate ways, our heroes find a chance to reminisce, as well as to plan for happy times sure to come!

title: Pokémon: Black & White
description: New friends, Pokémon, and adventures await as Ash and Pikachu arrive in the Unova region in Pokémon: Black & White, now on Pokémon TV!

media.title: In the Shadow of Zekrom!
media.description: Arriving in the Unova region, Ash must suddenly deal with the loss of Pikachu’s Electric-type powers!

media.title: Enter Iris and Axew!
media.description: Setting out on their journey in the Unova region, Ash and Pikachu meet up with new friends and old villains!

media.title: A Sandile Gusher of Change!
media.description: On their way to Striaton City and Ash’s first Unova Gym battle, our heroes come across a family whose hotel is in dire need of help!

media.title: The Battle Club and Tepig's Choice!
media.description: Ash discovers the Pokémon Battle Club—and a new friend!

media.title: Triple Leaders, Team Threats!
media.description: As Ash faces off against a most unusual challenge at the Striaton Gym, Team Rocket prepares to embark on the mission of a lifetime!

media.title: Dreams by the Yard Full!
media.description: Ash discovers that his opponent, Gym Leader Cilan, is a kindred spirit!

media.title: Snivy Plays Hard to Catch!
media.description: Traveling toward Nacrene City and his second Gym battle, Ash comes across an amazing Snivy that proves difficult to catch!

media.title: Saving Darmanitan from the Bell!
media.description: Our heroes come across a pair of Darumaka behaving in a most peculiar manner!

media.title: The Bloom Is on Axew!
media.description: A surprise battle between Iris’s Axew and Cilan’s Pansage reveals the story of a promise made not so long ago…

media.title: A Rival Battle for Club Champ!
media.description: Stopping at a Battle Club, Ash is surprised to find that his Unova region rival, Trip, is there as well!

media.title: A Home for Dwebble!
media.description: Our heroes come across a Dwebble with an unusual housing problem!

media.title: Here Comes the Trubbish Squad!
media.description: Our heroes meet a boisterous kindergarten class and their beloved Trubbish—although the teacher isn’t convinced!

media.title: Minccino—Neat and Tidy!
media.description: Professor Juniper’s assistant Bianca arrives, and things get interesting!

media.title: A Night in the Nacrene City Museum!
media.description: Arriving in Nacrene City, our heroes discover the Gym has a most unusual location and situation!

media.title: The Battle According to Lenora!
media.description: Ash’s Nacrene Gym battle is here, and Lenora isn’t about to go easy on our hero!

media.title: Rematch at the Nacrene Gym!
media.description: With Ash’s rematch at the Nacrene Gym coming soon, the first order of business is some serious special training!

media.title: Scraggy—Hatched to Be Wild!
media.description: Ash’s Pokémon Egg is ready to hatch, and our heroes are in for some surprising adventures!

media.title: Sewaddle and Burgh in Pinwheel Forest!
media.description: Our heroes get lost in a large forest on their way to Castelia City!

media.title: A Connoisseur's Revenge!
media.description: Our heroes discover a brand-new Poké Mart and meet a most unusual Pokémon Connoisseur!

media.title: Dancing with the Ducklett Trio!
media.description: Our heroes come across their old Pokémon friend Sandile, and three mischievous Pokémon!

media.title: The Lost World of Gothitelle!
media.description: Crossing the Skyarrow Bridge to Castelia City proves more complicated than our heroes expected!

media.title: A Venipede Stampede!
media.description: After arriving in Castelia City, our heroes discover an enormous swarm of Venipede threatening its citizens!

media.title: Battling for the Love of Bug-Types!
media.description: Ash’s battle with Burgh, the Castelia Gym Leader, has finally arrived!

media.title: Emolga the Irresistible!
media.description: As our heroes, along with their friend Bianca, continue toward the Nimbasa Gym, they come across a Pokémon that Bianca just has to catch!

media.title: Emolga and the New Volt Switch!
media.description: Iris’s new friend Emolga proves just how amazing and unpredictable a Pokémon can be!

media.title: Scare at the Litwick Mansion!
media.description: Our heroes seek shelter from a raging rainstorm in a mansion that turns out not to be empty!

media.title: The Dragon Master's Path!
media.description: Our heroes meet a fledgling Trainer with an important decision to make!

media.title: Oshawott's Lost Scalchop!
media.description: Our heroes come across a Trainer and his Blitzle who put Oshawott to the battle test!

media.title: Cottonee in Love!
media.description: Our heroes encounter a lovesick Cottonee with confidence issues!

media.title: A UFO for Elgyem!
media.description: Our heroes witness a mysterious UFO and a Pokémon with even more mysterious origins!

media.title: Ash and Trip's Third Battle!
media.description: Our heroes run into Ash’s rival Trip, leading to a third battle between two very determined Trainers!

media.title: Facing Fear with Eyes Wide Open!
media.description: Many of our heroes’ Pokémon have fallen ill from the poison spores of a group of Foongus, and Oshawott must face its fear to help provide the cure!

media.title: Iris and Excadrill against the Dragon Buster!
media.description: Our heroes meet a Dragon Buster named Georgia, who unexpectedly changes the relationship between Iris and Excadrill forever!

media.title: Gotta Catch a Roggenrola!
media.description: Our heroes’ lunch is interrupted by a feisty Roggenrola, which leads them to thwart another sinister Team Rocket plan!

media.title: Where Did You Go, Audino?
media.description: Our heroes investigate the case of the disappearing Audino and meet a couple of budding young sleuths in the process!

media.title: Archeops in the Modern World!
media.description: Reuniting with Professor Juniper and Dr. Fennel, our heroes witness the restoration of the ancient Pokémon Archen!

media.title: A Fishing Connoisseur in a Fishy Competition!
media.description: A fishing competition “lures” our heroes into a sinister Team Rocket plot!

media.title: Movie Time! Zorua in "The Legend of the Pokémon Knight!"
media.description: A discussion about favorite movies leads our heroes to a memorable encounter with a budding filmmaker and his amazing partner, Zorua!

media.title: Reunion Battles in Nimbasa!
media.description: As the Nimbasa Battle Tournament begins, our heroes meet up with old friends and rivals!

media.title: Cilan Versus Trip, Ash Versus Georgia!
media.description: It’s Cilan versus Trip during round one of the Nimbasa Battle Tournament! Then, for round two, it’s Ash versus Georgia!

media.title: The Club Battle Hearts of Fury: Emolga Versus Sawk!
media.description: The second round of the Nimbasa Battle Tournament rages on, culminating in a roaring battle between Iris’s agile Emolga and Stephan’s powerful Sawk!

media.title: Club Battle Finale: A Hero’s Outcome!
media.description: The final round of the Nimbasa Battle Tournament has arrived, with two good friends battling head to head!

media.title: Meowth's Scrafty Tactics!
media.description: A surprise appearance by Team Rocket’s Meowth helps our heroes solve some problems!

media.title: Purrloin, Sweet or Sneaky?
media.description: Our heroes come across a Purrloin in distress, though not everyone is buying its pleas for help!

media.title: Beheeyem, Duosion, and the Dream Thief!
media.description: Our heroes—and Meowth—have found themselves in a dream and can’t seem to awaken!

media.title: The Beartic Mountain Feud!
media.description: Our heroes discover a lost Cubchoo and get into a dangerous confrontation!

media.title: Crisis from the Underground Up!
media.description: Our heroes have arrived in Nimbasa City, unaware that a crisis of major proportions is about to be unleashed!

media.title: Battle for the Underground!
media.description: As Team Rocket continues their attempt to steal the Pokémon from the Nimbasa City Pokémon Center, our heroes must stop Team Rocket’s escaping Ghost Train—at all costs!

title: Pokémon: BW Rival Destinies
description: Encounters with Legendary and Mythical Pokémon and challenging tournaments await Ash in Pokémon: BW Rival Destinies, now on Pokémon TV!

media.title: Enter Elesa, Electrifying Gym Leader!
media.description: For Bianca to continue traveling with the gang, Ash must convince her dad she’s ready...even if it means a battle!

media.title: Dazzling the Nimbasa Gym!
media.description: The stakes are high for Ash at the Nimbasa Gym, and our hero isn’t taking any chances!

media.title: Lost at the Stamp Rally!
media.description: Spending the day in Nimbasa City after Ash’s fourth Unova Gym Badge win, Cilan has a special challenge in mind, while our heroes discover a fellow Trainer in need!

media.title: Ash Versus the Champion!
media.description: As our heroes prepare to leave Nimbasa City, they bump into Ash’s rival Trip, who introduces them to someone they had only dreamed of meeting!

media.title: A Maractus Musical!
media.description: On their way to Driftveil City, our heroes meet an enterprising young man with three dedicated friends and a dream!

media.title: The Four Seasons of Sawsbuck!
media.description: Our heroes meet a young Pokémon Photographer on the mission of a lifetime!

media.title: Scraggy and the Demanding Gothita!
media.description: On their way to Driftveil City and Ash’s next Gym Battle, our heroes meet a demanding Gothita with a crush on Scraggy!

media.title: The Lonely Deino!
media.description: On their way to Driftveil City and Ash’s next Gym battle, our heroes come across some very precious Pokémon in a very special place!

media.title: The Mighty Accelguard to the Rescue!
media.description: Ash arrives in Driftveil City only to be confronted with a series of perilous events! It may take a superhero (or two) to crack this case!

media.title: A Call for Brotherly Love!
media.description: While Ash prepares for his upcoming Gym Battle with Clay, a surprise visitor with a dilemma offers both Ash and Cilan the opportunity to help!

media.title: Stopping the Rage of Legends! Part 1
media.description: What started as a trip to Milos Island to find Revival Herbs has turned into a cataclysmic battle of Legendary proportions!

media.title: Stopping the Rage of Legends! Part 2
media.description: In search of scarce Revival Herbs, Ash and friends are now faced with the potential destruction of Milos Island!

media.title: Battling the King of the Mines!
media.description: Our heroes have returned to Driftveil City with the sought-after Revival Herbs, and Ash is eager to battle Gym Leader Clay!

media.title: Crisis at Chargestone Cave!
media.description: Continuing their journey to Mistralton City, our heroes come across Chargestone Cave and a dilemma for its residents!

media.title: Evolution Exchange Excitement!
media.description: After witnessing a dramatic Pokémon trade and Evolution, Ash and his friends’ excitement has just begun!

media.title: Explorers of the Hero's Ruin!
media.description: Professor Juniper’s father has invited our heroes to join him in what he promises will be an exciting adventure...and he keeps his promise!

media.title: Battling the Bully!
media.description: An encounter with Pikachu’s old rival puts our heroes in the middle of a bullying confrontation!

media.title: Baffling the Bouffalant!
media.description: An encounter with some very angry Bouffalant forces our heroes to take some unexpected precautions!

media.title: Cilan Takes Flight!
media.description: Arriving at the Mistralton City Gym, our heroes are shocked to discover a Gym Leader with a battle style they never would have imagined!

media.title: An Amazing Aerial Battle!
media.description: Ash and Gym Leader Skyla are ready to launch into battle! But Ash’s strategies—and Pokémon—may have to evolve for him to be victorious!

media.title: Climbing the Tower of Success!
media.description: After reuniting with two old friends, our heroes prepare to participate in a competition that takes making a wish to a higher level!

media.title: The Clubsplosion Begins!
media.description: Don George’s Clubsplosion Tournament is getting under way, and all our heroes—and their rivals—are ready to compete!

media.title: Search for the Clubultimate!
media.description: Round one of the Clubsplosion Tournament rages on, and the explosive action more than lives up to its name!

media.title: A Clubsplosion of Excitement!
media.description: The first round of the Clubsplosion nears completion, and Round Two promises even more excitement with every match!

media.title: Commanding the Clubsplosion Crown!
media.description: The Clubsplosion Tournament is all about intense head-to-head battling, but the final round will raise the bar even higher!

media.title: Battling the Leaf Thieves!
media.description: As our heroes continue toward Icirrus City, a joyous event precedes a crisis!

media.title: A Restoration Confrontation! Part 1
media.description: As our heroes continue their journey to the Icirrus City Gym, they find themselves deep inside Twist Mountain—and in the middle of another evil Team Rocket plot!

media.title: A Restoration Confrontation! Part 2
media.description: As our heroes battle to save their new Pokémon friends, an entire ancient world is at stake!

media.title: Evolution by Fire!
media.description: Stopping for the night at Don George’s Pokémon Battle Club on the path to Icirrus City, our heroes come across a Trainer with a surprising connection to their past!

media.title: Guarding the Guardian of the Mountain!
media.description: As our heroes near Icirrus City and Ash’s next Gym battle, they find themselves face to face with a star-studded cast!

media.title: Caution: Icy Battle Conditions!
media.description: The chance for Ash to earn his seventh Unova Gym badge is here, and it’s a slippery slope indeed!

media.title: Clash of the Connoisseurs!
media.description: When their travels are disrupted, our heroes are summoned to a place where Cilan’s Connoisseur skills are in high demand!

media.title: Crisis at Ferroseed Research!
media.description: On their way to Virbank City, our heroes run into a familiar face and an icy emergency!

media.title: An Epic Defense Force!
media.description: In Virbank City, an old friend gives our heroes a taste of movie-making they will never forget!

media.title: Rocking the Virbank Gym! Part 1
media.description: Ash’s quest for his eighth Gym badge gets under way—and the battle turns out to be a multimedia event indeed!

media.title: Rocking the Virbank Gym! Part 2
media.description: The battle between Ash and Roxie at Virbank Gym continues to rock! Who will take a bow as victor in front of the rowdy crowd?

media.title: All for the Love of Meloetta!
media.description: An unexpected encounter with an old friend in Virbank City presents our heroes with unexpected challenges!

media.title: Piplup, Pansage, and a Meeting of the Times!
media.description: With Cynthia’s help, our heroes have begun training for the Pokémon World Tournament Junior Cup, and a couple of old friends come along for the wild ride!

media.title: Expedition to Onix Island!
media.description: When our heroes take a break from special training, a mysterious island offers much more than they bargained for!

media.title: The Mystery of the Missing Cubchoo!
media.description: As our heroes train for the upcoming Pokémon World Tournament Junior Cup, a worried neighbor of Cynthia’s comes by for help!

media.title: Iris and the Rogue Dragonite!
media.description: While our heroes continue preparations for the Pokémon World Tournament Junior Cup, a sudden emergency and a Pokémon in need change their lives forever!

media.title: Jostling for the Junior Cup!
media.description: The Pokémon World Tournament Junior Cup is off to a roaring start, while our heroes are faced with rivals old and new!

media.title: Battling Authority Once Again!
media.description: The second round of the Pokémon World Tournament Junior Cup is off and running, while a battle between the winner and Alder waits in the wings!

media.title: Ash, Iris and Trip: Then There Were Three!
media.description: The exciting Pokémon World Tournament Junior Cup continues, and the semi-finals and finals hang in the balance of the results of these last two matches!

media.title: Goodbye, Junior Cup—Hello, Adventure!
media.description: The Pokémon World Tournament Junior Cup may be winding down, but new adventures are just beginning!

media.title: The Road to Humilau!
media.description: Our heroes’ new friend Cameron needs to win his eighth Gym badge in order to enter the Unova League, and that sets the stage for an unforgettable adventure!

media.title: Unrest at the Nursery!
media.description: While Ash trains for entry into the Unova League, our heroes discover a Pokémon nursery that urgently needs their help!

media.title: Meloetta and the Undersea Temple!
media.description: A sinister plot to take over the Unova region is taking shape, and our heroes are caught in the middle of it!

media.title: Unova’s Survival Crisis!
media.description: Team Rocket’s “Operation Tempest” is under way with a fierce vengeance, and the fate of the Unova region hangs in the balance!

title: Pokémon: BW Adventures in Unova and Beyond
description: Ash takes on the Unova League, meets N, battles Team Plasma, and more in Pokémon: BW Adventures in Unova and Beyond, now on Pokémon TV!

media.title: Beauties Battling for Pride and Prestige!
media.description: On their way to the site of the upcoming Unova League, our heroes take on an unexpectedly messy battle challenge!

media.title: A Surface to Air Tag Battle Team!
media.description: As our heroes continue their trek to Vertress City and the Unova League, they’re challenged to a Tag Battle the likes of which they’ve never experienced!

media.title: A Village Homecoming!
media.description: On their way to Vertress City, our heroes are visiting the Village of Dragons, where Iris is confronted with several life-changing challenges!

media.title: Drayden Versus Iris: Past, Present, and Future!
media.description: As Iris takes on a battle challenge issued by Opelucid Gym Leader Drayden, little does she know what's truly in store!

media.title: Team Eevee and the Pokémon Rescue Squad!
media.description: Ash and Iris are saved from a landslide by Virgil and his team of Eevee evolutions. Now it’s their turn to help him out!

media.title: Curtain Up, Unova League!
media.description: The big event we’ve all been waiting for is ready to begin! Watch the early action featuring Ash against his rival Trip!

media.title: Mission: Defeat Your Rival!
media.description: As the battle excitement in Vertress City builds to a fever pitch, the Unova League pairs friends and rivals, old and new!

media.title: Lost at the League!
media.description: While the Unova League prepares to move to the third round, our heroes are faced with a case of lost and found!

media.title: Strong Strategy Steals the Show!
media.description: As the Unova League makes its way through the third round and barrels toward the quarterfinals, strategy and friendship lead the way!

media.title: Cameron’s Secret Weapon!
media.description: It’s the fourth round of the Unova League, and Cameron’s “secret weapon” turns out to be more than anyone thought, including Cameron!

media.title: A Unova League Evolution!
media.description: As the Unova League roars toward the final match, the competition becomes more fierce, and the strength and skill levels more amazing!

media.title: New Places...Familiar Faces!
media.description: Now that the Unova League is over, our heroes contemplate what the future holds, while a new friend helps them deal with a blast from the past!

media.title: The Name's N!
media.description: On a ship heading to meet Professor Cedric Juniper at the White Ruins, our heroes are introduced to a young man with an unusual gift and an equally unusual point of view!

media.title: There’s a New Gym Leader in Town!
media.description: After arriving in Aspertia City at the request of Professor Juniper, our heroes pay a visit to one of the most unusual Gyms they’ve ever seen!

media.title: Team Plasma’s Pokémon Power Plot!
media.description: Continuing their journey to the White Ruins, our heroes encounter a mysterious organization with a sinister plot!

media.title: The Light of Floccesy Ranch!
media.description: As our heroes continue their journey to the White Ruins, they come across a Mareep ranch with some fog and leadership issues!

media.title: Saving Braviary!
media.description: Team Plasma is on the move, and so is N!

media.title: The Pokémon Harbor Patrol!
media.description: Arriving in Virbank City, our heroes and N encounter another group of heroes with some surprising results!

media.title: The Fires of a Red-Hot Reunion!
media.description: After discovering a festival celebrating the sights and sounds of the Kanto region, Ash reunites with an old friend who shows what real staying power is all about!

media.title: Team Plasma’s Pokémon Manipulation!
media.description: Team Plasma is determined to execute its evil plans, but our heroes and N have other ideas!

media.title: Secrets From Out of the Fog!
media.description: As our heroes continue their journey to the White Ruins, they learn startling secrets about N and Team Plasma!

media.title: Meowth, Colress, and Team Rivalry!
media.description: As Team Plasma’s mission to control Pokémon continues, Team Rocket’s mission takes aim at Team Plasma!

media.title: Ash and N: A Clash of Ideals!
media.description: Professor Cedric Juniper has unearthed a mysterious stone at the White Ruins. What connection does this object have with the Legendary Pokémon Reshiram?

media.title: Team Plasma and the Awakening Ceremony!
media.description: As Team Plasma’s plan to steal the Light Stone unfolds, our heroes and their friends are doing everything they can to stop it!

media.title: What Lies Beyond Truth and Ideals!
media.description: As the evil plan to control Reshiram continues to unfold, the survival of the world lies in Team Plasma’s defeat. But can they be defeated?!

media.title: Farewell, Unova! Setting Sail for New Adventures!
media.description: As our heroes prepare to enjoy the next chapter of their exciting adventures, others have different plans!

media.title: Danger, Sweet as Honey!
media.description: As our heroes begin exploring the Decolore Islands, their first stop starts off as a not-so-sweet experience!

media.title: Cilan and the Case of the Purrloin Witness!
media.description: As our heroes continue their Decolore Island-hopping cruise, a shipboard theft calls for some super-Connoisseur sleuthing!

media.title: Crowning the Scalchop King!
media.description: Arriving on Scalchop Island, our heroes decide to participate in an unusual competition!

media.title: The Island of Illusions!
media.description: A deserted island gives our heroes the opportunity to witness what enduring friendship is all about!

media.title: To Catch a Rotom!
media.description: Arriving on Torom Island, our heroes meet up with an old friend on an important research mission!

media.title: The Pirates of Decolore!
media.description: As our heroes continue their cruise through the Decolore Islands, a surprise visit by some unusual pirates changes everyone’s course!

media.title: Butterfree and Me!
media.description: As our heroes continue their tour of the Decolore Islands by ship, one island in particular offers them a chance to change a life for the better—forever!

media.title: The Path That Leads to Goodbye!
media.description: As they explore Capacia Island on their way to the Kanto region, little do our heroes know that the path they’re on leads to a place they never imagined!

media.title: Searching For a Wish!
media.description: Visiting a seemingly lifeless part of Capacia Island, our heroes come upon a life-giving solution to its problem!

media.title: Capacia Island UFO!
media.description: A bright light in the night sky gives our heroes a strange change of pace...and face!

media.title: The Journalist from Another Region!
media.description: As our heroes continue their tour of the Decolore Islands, they encounter a windfall of delicious berries and unexpected new friends!

media.title: Mystery on a Deserted Island!
media.description: Arriving on a deserted island on a quest for treasure, our heroes find something much more precious than they anticipated!

media.title: A Pokémon of a Different Color!
media.description: When Ash runs into an old friend en route to the Kanto region, Iris discovers a true kindred spirit!

media.title: Celebrating the Hero’s Comet!
media.description: As our heroes continue their tour of the Decolore Islands, an upcoming celestial event sets the stage for celestial intrigue and delight!

media.title: Go, Go, Gogoat!
media.description: A surprise detour in the Decolore Islands challenges our heroes to help some new friends in need!

media.title: Team Rocket’s Shocking Recruit!
media.description: A playful moment turns into a big misunderstanding, and our heroes are about to face a major challenge!

media.title: Survival of the Striaton Gym!
media.description: Cilan’s brothers arrive for a surprise visit, bringing with them the challenge of a lifetime!

media.title: Best Wishes Until We Meet Again!
media.description: As our heroes near Vermilion City and the end of their shipboard adventures, one familiar challenge forces them to spring into action!

media.title: The Dream Continues!
media.description: A visit to Pallet Town to see family and friends shows just how enduring Ash’s dreams really are!

title: Pokémon the Series: XY
description: Ash heads to the Kalos region and learns about the power of Mega Evolution in Pokémon the Series: XY, now on Pokémon TV!

media.title: Kalos, Where Dreams and Adventures Begin!
media.description: Ash and Pikachu have arrived in the Kalos region, and they waste no time building excitement and adventure to a fever pitch!

media.title: Lumiose City Pursuit!
media.description: After helping an ailing Pokémon, Ash puts everything he’s got on the line, while an entire city bears witness!

media.title: A Battle of Aerial Mobility!
media.description: Ash is eager to catch some Kalos Pokémon, and he’s definitely not alone!

media.title: A Shockingly Cheeky Friendship!
media.description: As our heroes continue their Kalos region journey, exciting new Pokémon friendships are the order of the day!

media.title: A Blustery Santalune Gym Battle!
media.description: Ash charges into his first Kalos region Gym battle against a tough and talented opponent. Is he ready to nab his first Gym badge?

media.title: Battling on Thin Ice!
media.description: Never one to give up, Ash sets his sights on a rematch with Gym Leader Viola in order to win his first Kalos region Gym badge!

media.title: Giving Chase at the Rhyhorn Race!
media.description: There’s an opportunity to be part of an exciting Rhyhorn race, and Ash can’t wait to give it a try!

media.title: Grooming Furfrou!
media.description: After seeing a superstar Pokémon groomer in their guidebook, our heroes are excited to meet him and his assistant in person!

media.title: Clemont’s Got a Secret!
media.description: As our heroes arrive back in Lumiose City, Clemont and Bonnie reveal a secret that has everyone else in shock!

media.title: Mega-Mega Meowth Madness!
media.description: During a visit with Professor Sycamore while in Lumiose City, our heroes encounter a surprising foe of mega-mega proportions!

media.title: The Bamboozling Forest!
media.description: As our heroes traverse a forest on their way to Cyllage City, some new Pokémon give them quite a challenge, and some old foes do, too!

media.title: To Catch a Pokémon Smuggler!
media.description: As our heroes continue their journey to Cyllage City and Ash’s next Gym battle, they must confront a most unsavory character in a most unsavory line of work!

media.title: Kindergarten Chaos!
media.description: What starts out as a typical battle challenge between two Trainers in the middle of the forest leads to a life-changing experience for one young boy!

media.title: Seeking Shelter from the Storm!
media.description: A powerful rainstorm brings our heroes to a scary mansion seeking shelter, with an unexpected outcome!

media.title: An Appetite for Battle!
media.description: A misunderstanding while camping out for the night turns out to be the perfect opportunity for some serious Pokémon-and-Trainer bonding!

media.title: A Jolting Switcheroo!
media.description: A Pokémon mix-up sends our heroes in a mad dash around town!

media.title: A Rush of Ninja Wisdom!
media.description: A ninja and his Frogadier agree to help Froakie work on its speed. But will it be enough to slow down Team Rocket?

media.title: Awakening the Sleeping Giant!
media.description: Arriving in Camphrier Town, our heroes find themselves in the middle of a dilemma of epic proportions!

media.title: A Conspiracy to Conquer!
media.description: Team Rocket may still be after Pikachu, but for now, everyone’s got another powerful Pokémon on their minds!

media.title: Breaking Titles at the Chateau!
media.description: A visit to an incredible Kalos region battling institution presents our heroes with lasting memories and a surprising revelation!

media.title: A Pokévision of Things to Come!
media.description: Ash and friends are exploring the world of Pokévision, and it’s chock-full of epic productions and cinematic surprises!

media.title: Going for the Gold!
media.description: A visit by our heroes to an amazing aquarium turns out to reveal the stuff of legends!

media.title: Coming Back into the Cold!
media.description: After running into an old friend, our heroes are about to witness a major discovery they’ll never forget!

media.title: Climbing the Walls!
media.description: The time for Ash’s Gym battle with Grant at the Cyllage City Gym is finally here, and it’s an uphill climb!

media.title: A Battle by Any Other Name!
media.description: A sweet treat has Serena competing head-to-head in a battle of skills, wits, and hearts!

media.title: To Find a Fairy Flower!
media.description: A new hairstyle for Bonnie leads our heroes to new friends in need!

media.title: The Bonds of Evolution!
media.description: A chance encounter with the Champion gives our heroes a deeper look into the mysteries of Evolution!

media.title: Heroes—Friends and Faux Alike!
media.description: A case of mistaken identity is part of a sinister plot to catch Pikachu once and for all!

media.title: Mega Revelations!
media.description: A chance meeting with Gym Leader Korrina and her partner Lucario presents our heroes with more surprises then they could’ve imagined!

media.title: The Cave of Trials!
media.description: The search for Lucarionite is on, and Korrina faces challenges she never dreamed of!

media.title: The Aura Storm!
media.description: Korrina, Lucario, and our heroes discover there is much more to Mega Evolution than they ever imagined!

media.title: Calling from Beyond the Aura!
media.description: On their way to Pomace Mountain, Korrina, Lucario, and our heroes witness the next step in the Mega Evolution saga!

media.title: The Bonds of Mega Evolution!
media.description: Korrina and Lucario are on Pomace Mountain with our heroes, where they learn more about Mega Evolution in a most unexpected way!

media.title: The Forest Champion!
media.description: On their way to Shalour City, our heroes come across an amazing Pokémon with a powerful and unique way of battling!

media.title: Battles in the Sky!
media.description: Ash and Hawlucha are ready for their first Sky Battle, high over the majestic Kalos Canyon!

media.title: The Cave of Mirrors!
media.description: While exploring a well-known cave on their way to Shalour City, our heroes see themselves in unexpectedly different ways!

media.title: Forging Forest Friendships!
media.description: Some family squabbling gives rise to some fabulous teamwork!

media.title: Summer of Discovery!
media.description: It’s the first day of Professor Sycamore’s Pokémon summer camp, and the excitement and adventures are just getting under way!

media.title: Day Three Blockbusters!
media.description: It’s day three of Professor Sycamore’s Pokémon Summer Camp, and Pokévision is on everyone’s minds!

media.title: Foggy Pokémon Orienteering!
media.description: On day five of Professor Sycamore’s Pokémon summer camp, Pokémon Orienteering leads our heroes to a mysterious discovery!

media.title: Battling into the Hall of Fame!
media.description: It’s the final day of Professor Sycamore’s Pokémon summer camp, and entry into the hall of fame is right around the corner for the winning team!

media.title: Origins of Mega Evolution!
media.description: Our heroes have finally arrived in Shalour City, and Ash’s Gym battle against Korrina is imminent!

media.title: Showdown at the Shalour Gym!
media.description: The long-awaited Gym battle between Ash and Korrina is getting under way, and it promises to be one for the ages!

media.title: Splitting Heirs!
media.description: As our heroes make their way to Coumarine City and Ash’s next Gym battle, they come across two brothers with a lesson to learn, and to share!

media.title: The Clumsy Crier Quiets the Chaos!
media.description: A visit to a Pokémon Center introduces our heroes to a Wigglytuff with an unusual way of doing things!

media.title: Dreaming a Performer's Dream!
media.description: Our heroes attend their first Pokémon Showcase, an experience that gives Serena a lot to think about!

media.title: A Campus Reunion!
media.description: Clemont revisits his school days and meets up with a few old friends, both people and Pokémon!

media.title: Bonnie for the Defense!
media.description: As our heroes continue toward the Coumarine City Gym, Bonnie makes some new friends—and they’re a force to be reckoned with!

title: Pokémon the Series: XY Kalos Quest
description: Don’t miss Ash’s continuing adventures through the Kalos region in Pokémon the Series: XY Kalos Quest, now on Pokémon TV!

media.title: Pathways to Performance Partnering!
media.description: After a squabble between friends, a chance meeting gives our heroes a chance for some unexpected teamwork!

media.title: When Light and Dark Collide!
media.description: After Ash makes a mistake, his Hawlucha finds itself in the performance of a lifetime!

media.title: An Undersea Place to Call Home!
media.description: Before Ash’s Cyllage City Gym battle, a visit to the Muraille Coast sets our heroes on an aquatic adventure filled with undersea Pokémon!

media.title: A Stealthy Challenge!
media.description: After running into a friend, our heroes embark upon an adventure filled with stealth and surprise!

media.title: A Race for Home!
media.description: A visit to a Skiddo ranch provides our heroes with some unexpected challenges!

media.title: Facing the Grand Design!
media.description: The entire world is in danger, and an unlikely group of longtime foes must join forces to save it!

media.title: A Slippery Encounter!
media.description: A chance encounter with a Pokémon in need leads our heroes into an unexpected adventure!

media.title: One for the Goomy!
media.description: The newest member of our heroes’ Pokémon family is in trouble, but their smallest member steps in to help!

media.title: Thawing an Icy Panic!
media.description: Our heroes have arrived in Coumarine City, where they’re immediately confronted by a crisis with bone-chilling consequences!

media.title: The Green, Green Grass-Types of Home!
media.description: The time for Ash’s Coumarine City Gym battle is here, and with it the chance to learn and grow!

media.title: Under the Pledging Tree!
media.description: A Coumarine City tradition is in jeopardy, and our heroes are faced with averting a major crisis!

media.title: A Showcase Debut!
media.description: It’s Serena’s Pokémon Showcase debut, surrounded by friends and rivals, old and new!

media.title: An Oasis of Hope!
media.description: There’s a bully in the Lumiose Badlands, and many helpless Pokémon are depending on our heroes for their freedom!

media.title: The Future Is Now, Thanks to Determination!
media.description: When the Kalos Power Plant is held under siege, the safety of Lumiose City and many Pokémon hangs in the balance!

media.title: A Fork in the Road! A Parting of the Ways!
media.description: A conflict of heartfelt emotions threatens the future of a longstanding partnership!

media.title: Battling with Elegance and a Big Smile!
media.description: A chance meeting with a mystery Pokémon performer provides Serena and her Pokémon with some priceless advice and support!

media.title: Good Friends, Great Training!
media.description: A surprise reunion with an old friend gives Ash the perfect opportunity for training—and even more surprises!

media.title: Confronting the Darkness!
media.description: Ash is finally in Lumiose City for his Gym battle with Clemont, but a major crisis threatens the proceedings!

media.title: The Moment of Lumiose Truth!
media.description: The long-awaited Gym battle between Ash and Gym Leader Clemont is off and running, and lots of intense training is being put to the test!

media.title: Garchomp’s Mega Bond!
media.description: When our heroes visit Professor Sycamore on their way out of Lumiose City, they’re in for a surprise of mega proportions!

media.title: Defending the Homeland!
media.description: When Ash’s Goodra encounters an old friend, our heroes take a journey to learn about its mysterious past!

media.title: Beyond the Rainbow!
media.description: With Goodra’s beloved wetlands in imminent danger, our heroes are faced with a must-win situation for the sake of the many Pokémon who live there!

media.title: So You’re Having a Bad Day!
media.description: The daily fortune in Serena’s guidebook predicts a bad day for our heroes…and that prediction turns out to be accurate!

media.title: Scary Hospitality!
media.description: A rainy night and an old mansion combine to give our heroes an evening to remember—or not!

media.title: A Fashionable Battle!
media.description: Our heroes have arrived in Laverre City, and the Gym Leader there has a wardrobe of surprises in store!

media.title: Fairy-Type Trickery!
media.description: Ash is ready to battle Valerie at the Laverre Gym, and it appears thinking on his feet could be our hero’s key to victory!

media.title: Rivals: Today and Tomorrow!
media.description: After Ash’s fierce battle with Valerie at the Laverre Gym, young Sawyer has a lot of questions!

media.title: A Not-So-Flying Start!
media.description: A chance discovery on their way to Anistar City gives our heroes a challenging teaching moment!

media.title: A Relay in the Sky!
media.description: When our heroes come upon an aerial Pokémon race, their newest member gets a chance to spread its wings!

media.title: A Frenzied Factory Fiasco!
media.description: A tour of the Poké Ball Factory provides our heroes with much more than just Poké Balls!

media.title: Performing with Fiery Charm!
media.description: Serena’s next Pokémon Showcase appearance is taking place in Dendemille Town, and she’s faced with some stiff competition!

media.title: Rotom's Wish!
media.description: A visit to a peculiar hotel gives our heroes the chance to right a wrong from long ago!

media.title: A Festival Trade! A Festival Farewell?
media.description: During a visit to a popular festival, our heroes fall victim to several cases of mistaken identity!

media.title: Over the Mountain of Snow!
media.description: A trip over a snow-covered mountain gives our heroes the chance to truly help those in need!

media.title: Adventures in Running Errands!
media.description: When the power goes out at a Pokémon Center, our heroes and their Pokémon charge in to help!

media.title: Mending a Broken Spirit!
media.description: A crisis in confidence leads to renewed strength and determination!

media.title: A Legendary Photo Op!
media.description: A chance reunion with an old friend gives our heroes an experience of legendary proportions!

media.title: The Tiny Caretaker!
media.description: Bonnie and friends rescue a little Tyrunt...at least until Team Rocket strikes again!

media.title: A Trip Down Memory Train!
media.description: An emergency situation offers the perfect opportunity to recall a heartwarming story of times past!

media.title: A Frolicking Find in the Flowers!
media.description: A beautiful meadow provides our heroes with the perfect spot to take a break and witness a surprising performance!

media.title: Lights! Camera! Pika!
media.description: A masterpiece is in the making, and our heroes can’t wait to be involved!

media.title: Tag Team Inspiration!
media.description: A friendly Tag Battle provides Eevee and Serena with some confidence—and inspiration!

media.title: A Performance Pop Quiz!
media.description: It’s time for the Anistar City Pokémon Showcase, and a second Princess Key hangs in the balance for Serena!

media.title: Cloudy Fate, Bright Future!
media.description: As our heroes look to Ash’s next battle at the Anistar City Gym, they discover things about its Gym Leader they never could have imagined!

media.title: All Eyes on the Future!
media.description: The time for Ash’s Anistar City Gym battle has arrived, but in this case, time has some unexpected meanings!

title: Pokémon the Series: XYZ
description: Ash’s Kalos region adventure reaches its exciting conclusion in Pokémon the Series: XYZ, now on Pokémon TV!

media.title: From A to Z!
media.description: Bonnie makes a new friend, Ash runs into an old friend, and a terrifying premonition begins to unfold!

media.title: Love Strikes! Eevee, Yikes!
media.description: While Eevee deals with some unwanted attention, Team Rocket turns its attention to Squishy!

media.title: A Giga Battle with Mega Results!
media.description: There’s trouble at the local Pokémon Center, but our heroes and Professor Sycamore are there to help!

media.title: A Fiery Rite of Passage!
media.description: As our heroes continue their journey to Snowbelle City, they encounter a young Pokémon faced with the challenges of growing up!

media.title: Dream a Little Dream from Me!
media.description: A nighttime campout brings some interesting adventures for our heroes’ Pokémon!

media.title: The Legend of the Ninja Hero!
media.description: Ash’s friend Sanpei is showing our heroes around his home in Ninja Village, but this peaceful place will soon be threatened!

media.title: A Festival of Decisions!
media.description: On the eve of the village festival, the fate of Ninja Village hangs in the balance!

media.title: A Dancing Debut!
media.description: Our heroes are in Couriway Town for Serena’s next Pokémon Showcase, and her third Princess Key win is at stake!

media.title: Meeting at Terminus Cave!
media.description: Our heroes are visiting Terminus Cave with hopes of seeing new Pokémon, but they're not alone!

media.title: A Cellular Connection!
media.description: A courageous rescue during our heroes’ search for Squishy leaves one of their friends in danger!

media.title: A Windswept Encounter!
media.description: An expansive field of flowers provides our heroes with a beautiful setting to witness a blooming friendship!

media.title: Party Dancecapades!
media.description: Serena is invited to a dance party for Pokémon performers, and there are many surprises in store!

media.title: A Meeting of Two Journeys!
media.description: A fierce battle between two powerful Pokémon is about much more than just who wins!

media.title: An Explosive Operation!
media.description: As Team Flare continues to advance Operation Z, they get help from an unexpected source!

media.title: A Watershed Moment!
media.description: Traversing a vast expanse of parched land, our heroes discover a small group of dedicated individuals in need!

media.title: Master Class Choices!
media.description: It’s Pokémon Showcase time for Serena, and winning her third Princess Key is on the line!

media.title: An Electrifying Rage!
media.description: Our heroes are about to take part in an exciting celebration, but the guest of honor is not happy!

media.title: Unlocking Some Respect!
media.description: Our heroes plan to visit a gem exhibition—but they run into a mystery instead!

media.title: Master Class Is in Session!
media.description: The Pokémon Showcase Master Class is under way, and Serena is competing with friends and rivals galore!

media.title: Performing a Pathway to the Future!
media.description: The Pokémon Showcase Master Class is in full swing, and Serena’s quest to become Kalos Queen is shifting into high gear!

media.title: A Keeper for Keeps?
media.description: Bonnie has been looking for someone to take care of her big brother...but what will happen when she finds that someone?

media.title: Battling at Full Volume!
media.description: While Ash battles a fever, another Trainer comes along to challenge him to a Pokémon battle!

media.title: The Synchronicity Test!
media.description: Ash and Greninja have displayed some amazing and mysterious traits in battle, and Clemont wants to find out why!

media.title: Making Friends and Influencing Villains!
media.description: Team Rocket is still after Pikachu, but a shy, rare Pokémon is getting in their way!

media.title: Championing a Research Battle!
media.description: Ash wants to learn more about what happens when he and Greninja merge during battle, and the Champion Diantha is the right person to help!

media.title: A Full-Strength Battle Surprise!
media.description: During our heroes’ final leg of their journey to Snowbelle City, a chance meeting with an old friend and rival gives Ash a surprising battle opportunity!

media.title: All Hail the Ice Battlefield!
media.description: The time for Ash’s Snowbelle City Gym battle is here, and his eighth Gym badge hangs in the balance!

media.title: Seeing the Forest for the Trees!
media.description: Following Ash’s defeat at the Snowbelle Gym, some not-so-quiet introspection turns into some real inspiration!

media.title: A Real Icebreaker!
media.description: Ash is back at the Snowbelle City Gym for a rematch, but will Gym Leader Wulfric feel the heat?

media.title: A Diamond in the Rough!
media.description: A visit to a friend confronts our heroes with a most unusual group of challenges!

media.title: A Gaggle of Gadget Greatness!
media.description: Clemont has invited the rest of our heroes to experience one of his true passions, while a certain group of uninvited guests are along for the ride!

media.title: A League of His Own!
media.description: The Kalos League is just getting under way, and the battle temperature is already turned way up!

media.title: Valuable Experience for All!
media.description: The Kalos League rages on toward the semifinals, and the red-hot battling never ceases to excite and amaze!

media.title: Analysis Versus Passion!
media.description: The semifinals of the Kalos League have arrived, bringing two intense battles!

media.title: A Riveting Rivalry!
media.description: As the Kalos League semifinal round continues between Ash and Sawyer, the audience witnesses a rivalry few have ever experienced!

media.title: Kalos League Passion with a Certain Flare!
media.description: The final round of the Kalos League is about to get under way, and there’s a lot going on behind the scenes!

media.title: Finals Not for the Faint-Hearted!
media.description: It’s time for the Kalos League finals, and it’s Ash versus Alain in their much-anticipated battle!

media.title: Down to the Fiery Finish!
media.description: The final round of the Kalos League is in high gear, and surprises are in abundance: from the first second to the very last!

media.title: A Towering Takeover!
media.description: Lysandre and Team Flare are attempting to take over Lumiose City and the world, and our heroes are in the middle of the chaos!

media.title: Coming Apart at the Dreams!
media.description: Lumiose City is on the verge of ruin, but our heroes and their friends are not about to stand by and do nothing!

media.title: The Right Hero for the Right Job!
media.description: The fate of Kalos and the world depends on the outcome of Team Flare’s plans, and our heroes are doing their best to stop them!

media.title: Rocking Kalos Defenses!
media.description: The fate of Chespie and the world rests in the hands of an extraordinarily powerful group of friends and allies!

media.title: Forming a More Perfect Union!
media.description: The moment of truth has arrived, as our heroes and their friends must face the final challenge that will decide the fate of the world!

media.title: Battling with a Clean Slate!
media.description: The Lumiose City Gym is still being repaired, but a battle challenge from a young Trainer is just the thing to get everyone and everything up and running!

media.title: The First Day of the Rest of Your Life!
media.description: Our heroes are busy planning their futures, but one is having more trouble planning than the others!

media.title: Facing the Needs of the Many!
media.description: As our heroes prepare to go their separate ways, they face the return of a danger that wasn’t quite defeated!

media.title: Till We Compete Again!
media.description: Our heroes are going their separate ways, and it’s time for goodbyes, fond memories, and eyes to the future!

media.title: The Legend of X, Y, and Z!
media.description: A trip to some newly discovered ruins in Kalos reveals a rich history of compassion and caring from three Legendary Pokémon!

media.title: Alola to New Adventure!
media.description: What begins as a vacation for our hero on Melemele Island in the Alola region turns into the promise of many, many exciting adventures to come!

media.title: The Guardian’s Challenge!
media.description: Ash and Pikachu are adjusting to life in the Alola region—and it’s about to give them a powerful push in a new direction!

media.title: Loading the Dex!
media.description: Ash’s journey in the Alola region is just getting under way, and our hero has a new partner to share it with!

media.title: First Catch in Alola, Ketchum-Style!
media.description: Ash is after his first Pokémon in the Alola region, and the adventure that ensues is typical Ash!

media.title: Yo, Ho, Ho! Go, Popplio!
media.description: Ash’s Pokémon class is off to the sea for some fishing, but Team Rocket has a completely different kind of fishing in mind!

media.title: A Shocking Grocery Run!
media.description: Ash’s first day off from Pokémon School was supposed to be a relaxing break, but things don’t go quite as expected!

media.title: That's Why the Litten Is a Scamp!
media.description: A feisty Litten is determined to steal food from others, and Ash and Pikachu are determined to find out why!

media.title: Lillie's Egg-Xhilarating Challenge!
media.description: Lillie has a Pokémon Egg to care for until it hatches, but will fear get in her way?

media.title: To Top a Totem!
media.description: Ash is determined to undergo the island challenge and replace his Z-Crystal, so Professor Kukui takes him to meet Hala, the kahuna of Melemele Island.

media.title: Trial and Tribulation!
media.description: The Melemele Island grand trial is imminent, and Ash must square off against the power and wisdom of Kahuna Hala!

media.title: Young Kiawe Had a Farm!
media.description: Ash has time off from school for training, but a fellow student’s activities away from school have our hero wanting to find out all about it!

media.title: The Sun, the Scare, the Secret Lair!
media.description: While our heroes enjoy a class on the beach, familiar and unfamiliar troubles are brewing behind the scenes!

media.title: Racing to a Big Event!
media.description: An Alolan tradition whets everyone’s appetite for fun, and Ash decides to join in!

media.title: Getting to Know You!
media.description: The time has come for Lillie to address her fears, and having a new friend is the perfect way to do it!

media.title: Rocking Clawmark Hill!
media.description: Rockruff’s current behavior may be a mystery, but Ash and Professor Kukui are determined to get to the bottom of it!

media.title: They Might Not Be Giants!
media.description: Team Rocket has their eyes on our heroes’ Pokémon, but a mysterious third Pokémon has a different idea!

media.title: Crystal-Clear Sleuthing!
media.description: There’s a mystery that needs solving, and there’s also a surprising sleuth who’s determined to solve it!

media.title: A Seasoned Search!
media.description: Rotom Dex is eager to help solve the mystery of Ash’s missing Z-Crystal!

media.title: A Guardian Rematch!
media.description: Ash is looking for a very important rematch, and his training regimen is breaking new ground!

media.title: Partner Promises!
media.description: A pleasant day trip for our heroes turns into an unforgettable adventure!

media.title: One Journey Ends, Another Begins...
media.description: The ending of one chapter in the life of a determined Pokémon ushers in the beginning of a brand-new one!

media.title: A Shivering Shovel Search!
media.description: A day at the beach offers up our heroes much more than they bargained for!

media.title: Getting the Band Back Together!
media.description: A major force in Alolan popular music is on the verge of collapse!

media.title: Alolan Open House!
media.description: It’s Open House day at the Pokémon School, and a surprising group of people has gathered for all the fun!

media.title: A Team-on-Team Tussle!
media.description: There’s a Z-Crystal ripe for the picking, but are the unlikely pickers up to the task?

media.title: So Long, Sophocles!
media.description: Moving to a new place and a new life can be stressful for anyone, and the Pokémon School gang is no exception!

media.title: A Glaring Rivalry!
media.description: A powerful Trainer has recently appeared on Melemele Island, and Ash can’t wait to find out everything about him!

media.title: Pulling Out the Pokémon Base Pepper!
media.description: It’s Pokémon Base season in Alola, and the Pokémon School gang can’t seem to get enough of it: even playing against the enemy!

media.title: Lulled to La-La Land!
media.description: A Pokémon School camping trip, complete with a scary campfire story, makes for an experience our heroes will never forget!

media.title: The Ol’ Raise and Switch!
media.description: An unusual assignment at the Pokémon School gives our heroes a surprising opportunity to learn, grow, and have fun at the same time!

media.title: The Island Whisperer!
media.description: Our heroes are preparing for a field trip on Akala Island, and the island kahuna promises to make it a trip to remember!

media.title: Treasure Hunt, Akala Style!
media.description: It’s a new day for the Pokémon School field trip, and our heroes are preparing for an adventure they will treasure forever!

media.title: Big Sky, Small Fry!
media.description: Our heroes are busy with extracurricular activities on Akala Island, and Ash and Lana are in for a great adventure!

media.title: A Crowning Moment of Truth!
media.description: The Wela Fire Festival is just starting to heat up, but someone seems determined to extinguish the celebration!

media.title: Currying Favor and Flavor!
media.description: Our heroes are embarking on a mission filled with good taste…and a surprising finish!

media.title: Trials and Determinations!
media.description: The time for Ash’s grand trial with Olivia is finally here, and it’s no ordinary battle!

media.title: Rising from the Ruins!
media.description: As if Ash’s victory at his grand trial wasn’t monumental enough, an unexpected transformation makes a memorable field trip even more momentous!

media.title: Mimikyu Unmasked!
media.description: When Mimikyu faces a fashion problem, Jessie sees a bonding opportunity!

media.title: Mallow and the Forest Teacher!
media.description: It’s a challenging day for Mallow and her family restaurant, and emotions are running high!

media.title: Balloons, Brionne, and Belligerence!
media.description: Lana and Popplio are working hard to master their Z-Move, but their progress is soon to grow by leaps and bounds!

media.title: Mounting an Electrifying Charge!
media.description: Three of our heroes are teaming up for the annual Charjabug race, an electrifying event with shocking results!

media.title: Alola, Kanto!
media.description: A celebratory Pokémon School class trip turns out to be a reunion no one will ever forget!

media.title: When Regions Collide!
media.description: The Cerulean Gym is the setting for old and new friends, battling old and new skills!

title: Pokémon the Series: Sun & Moon—Ultra Adventures

media.title: A Dream Encounter!
media.description: A vivid dream has set our hero on a mission to find out its true meaning!

media.title: Now You See Them, Now You Don’t!
media.description: As our heroes get to know Nebby better, Nebby gets to know them better, too!

media.title: Deceiving Appearances!
media.description: While our heroes explore one part of Aether Paradise, Team Rocket is busy exploring another!

media.title: A Masked Warning!
media.description: Ash and his friends are off on another big adventure, thanks to Nebby’s amazing powers!

media.title: Night of a Thousand Poses!
media.description: A sleepover at Professor Kukui’s house sets the stage for fun, friendship, and unexpected adventure!

media.title: Mission: Total Recall!
media.description: Lillie is on a mission to put her past behind her once and for all!

media.title: Faba’s Revenge!
media.description: Although Faba’s original sinister plot has been foiled, he isn’t about to give up on his dream!

media.title: Family Determination!
media.description: Lusamine has been captured by an Ultra Beast and swept away through an Ultra Wormhole, but everyone is determined to get her back safely!

media.title: Revealing the Stuff of Legend!
media.description: Our heroes are determined to rescue Lusamine, and help is coming from unexpected and astounding sources!

media.title: Rescuing the Unwilling!
media.description: Our heroes are determined to rescue Lusamine from inside the Ultra Wormhole, but Lusamine has other ideas!

media.title: 10,000,000 Reasons to Fight!
media.description: Our heroes are doing everything they can to save Lusamine from an Ultra Beast…while Lusamine is doing everything she can to stop them!

media.title: The Professors’ New Adventure!
media.description: Professors Kukui and Burnet are getting married, and our heroes know just what to do to help!

media.title: Let Sleeping Pokémon Lie!
media.description: Our heroes are wondering about Komala’s sleep patterns when they’re interrupted by a familiar visitor!

media.title: The Dex Can’t Help It!
media.description: Rotom Dex embarks on an electrifying journey—whether it wants to or not!

media.title: Fighting Back the Tears!
media.description: An accidental encounter with the past puts the present and future in jeopardy!

media.title: Tasting the Bitter with the Sweet!
media.description: A distant memory shared by Mallow and Lana is rekindled in a bittersweet way!

media.title: Getting a Jump on the Competition!
media.description: A trip to Mount Lanakila gives our heroes the opportunity to learn and grow in ways they hadn’t imagined!

media.title: A Mission of Ultra Urgency!
media.description: The appearance of another Ultra Beast compels our heroes to take on new roles—and take charge!

media.title: Acting True to Form!
media.description: An unexpected appearance by a cunning visitor is turning Team Rocket’s world on its head!

media.title: Pushing the Fiery Envelope!
media.description: The appearance of a popular Alolan battling duo brings out some surprising fiery determination!

media.title: Turning Heads and Training Hard!
media.description: A visit by a surprise Pokémon School graduate dazzles our heroes with the stuff of legends!

media.title: Smashing with Sketch!
media.description: Pokémon School graduate Ilima teaches our heroes about an activity that’s near and dear to his heart!

media.title: Love at First Twirl!
media.description: Our heroes are about to welcome an unexpected addition into the family—unexpected in so many delightful ways!

media.title: Real Life…Inquire Within!
media.description: Nurse Joy is feeling a bit under the weather today, but we know just the heroes to help her out!

media.title: Rise and Shine, Starship!
media.description: A potential disaster threatens the future of the Alola region, but the Ultra Guardians are ready, willing, and able to deal with it!

media.title: The Young Flame Strikes Back!
media.description: The survival of Kiawe’s family farm may be at stake, but our heroes are up to the challenge!

media.title: Dewpider Ascending!
media.description: There are lots of interesting Pokémon for our heroes to discover in Alola, and the one they meet today is no exception!

media.title: Sours for the Sweet!
media.description: There’s a big baking competition coming up in Alola, and a surprising participant is joining in on the fun!

media.title: Why Not Give Me a Z-Ring Sometime?
media.description: Team Rocket appears to be stuck in a rut, but solutions can come from high places!

media.title: Tough Guy Trials!
media.description: A series of smaller trials line the pathway to Ash’s goal—a grand trial!

media.title: Some Kind of Laziness!
media.description: Ash is determined to train with Tapu Bulu, and Tapu Bulu is determined to be as unpredictable as ever!

media.title: A Battle Hand-Off!
media.description: Ash and Pikachu are all set for their rematch against the island kahuna, but Nanu has a different idea!

media.title: Guiding an Awakening!
media.description: Ash challenges Kahuna Nanu in the Ula’ula Island grand trial. In order to win, Ash must defeat three of Nanu’s Pokémon with only one of his. Can Lycanroc pull through?

media.title: Twirling with a Bang!
media.description: The Ultra Guardians are being called upon again, but this time, they’re on double duty!

media.title: Showering the World with Love!
media.description: Our heroes are stargazing, little suspecting the spectacle that awaits them in the night sky!

media.title: Not Caving Under Pressure!
media.description: A surprising show of determination leads to a happy outcome for many—in many different ways!

media.title: A Young Royal Flame Ignites!
media.description: The Battle Royal Dome is ablaze with battling excitement, but this time the Masked Royal has a little help!

media.title: All They Want to Do Is Dance, Dance!
media.description: A rousing Pokémon School class project has everyone out of their chairs, and out on the floor!

media.title: Dummy, You Shrunk the Kids!
media.description: When Faba appoints himself professor for the day at the Pokémon School, an unexpected event shows that big adventures can come in small packages!

media.title: The Shape of Love to Come!
media.description: Our heroes have met an astoundingly talented artist, but there’s much more to her and her partner than meets the eye!

media.title: The Long Vault Home!
media.description: Another Ultra Beast has made its way to Alola, and the Ultra Guardians have an ultra-gigantic mission on their hands!

media.title: I Choose Paradise!
media.description: Everybody’s looking forward to a relaxing day at a health spa, although a few secretly have different plans!

media.title: Filling the Light with Darkness!
media.description: Things are not right in Alola, and our heroes are poised to find out why!

media.title: Full Moon and Many Arms!
media.description: A mysterious creature has emerged from an Ultra Wormhole and now appears to be threatening Alola, but our heroes are ready to do anything they can to help!

media.title: The Prism Between Light and Darkness!
media.description: Our heroes are on a mission to rescue Solgaleo from UB Black’s clutches, and what a mission it is turning out to be!

media.title: Securing the Future!
media.description: The Ultra Guardians are on a mission to save Poipole’s world, and everyone and everything depends on them!

media.title: A Plethora of Pikachu!
media.description: The rumors are true, and our heroes can’t pika-believe what they find!

media.title: Turning the Other Mask!
media.description: It’s time for the Masked Royal to face his old rival in the ring, but first, there are a few obstacles to be dealt with!

title: Pokémon the Series: Sun & Moon—Ultra Legends
description: The journey continues on Pokémon TV! Watch episodes from the new Pokémon the Series: Sun & Moon—Ultra Legends season today!

media.title: Lillier and the Staff!
media.description: The Pokémon School class is putting on a play with more twists and turns than they could ever expect!

media.title: A Haunted House for Everyone!
media.description: Harper and Sarah are excited to visit a haunted house, and they end up having a bit too much fun!

media.title: Sparking Confusion!
media.description: Some unusual activity is occurring around Wela Volcano, but the Ultra Guardians are on the case!

media.title: Don’t Ignore the Small Stufful!
media.description: While Ash runs an errand to Aether Paradise, a certain trio of troublemakers sets out to catch Pokémon there!

media.title: No Stone Unturned!
media.description: A chance meeting with another Trainer gives Ash and Rowlet new battle experiences they never imagined!

media.title: Bright Lights, Big Changes!
media.description: Rotom Dex’s love of the hit TV show Alolan Detective Laki produces some unexpected results!

media.title: We Know Where You’re Going, Eevee!
media.description: An ocean-loving Eevee has traveled many miles…and where one journey ends, another is about to begin!

media.title: Battling the Beast Within!
media.description: A spur-of-the-moment battle with Tapu Koko results in an unexpected, unbelievable journey for Ash and Pikachu!

media.title: Parallel Friendships!
media.description: Our heroes are grappling with an Alola region in a parallel world—and they’ve appeared just in time to help save it!

media.title: Alola, Alola!
media.description: At the start of their break, the Pokémon School students have visitors—and Ash can’t believe his eyes!

media.title: Heart of Fire, Heart of Stone!
media.description: Misty and Brock continue to enjoy their Alola region vacation, but there are some who would like that to stop!

media.title: That’s Some Spicy Island Research!
media.description: Our heroes are visiting Poni Island for their school research projects, but they’re not the only ones with big plans!

media.title: Showdown on Poni Island!
media.description: Ash’s research project is all about battling, but who will that battling involve?

media.title: Evolving Research!
media.description: As the Pokémon School class continues their research projects on Poni Island, Sophocles and Lana have some big surprises in store!

media.title: Run, Heroes, Run!
media.description: Our heroes’ research projects continue on Poni Island, and now is the time for Kiawe and Mallow to shine!

media.title: Memories in the Mist!
media.description: A visit to Hapu’s farm envelops our heroes in an experience they will never forget!

media.title: A Grand Debut!
