media.description: The Pokémon School students have one more research project to complete, and it’s sure to generate excitement and electricity for everyone!

media.title: Keeping Your Eyes on the Ball!
media.description: When the Pokémon School class meets an accomplished Pokémon Golfer, they learn some valuable lessons and have fun at the same time!

media.title: Show Me the Metal!
media.description: Our heroes have made an incredible discovery, and they’re just beginning to digest the details!

media.title: Got Meltan?
media.description: Our heroes have discovered a new species of Pokémon named Meltan, and one Meltan in particular has discovered a new friend!

media.title: This Magik Moment!
media.description: An appearance on a TV quiz show leads our heroes into a world they only dreamed of!

media.title: Beauty Is Only Crystal Deep!
media.description: Alola is facing another crisis, and the Ultra Guardians are facing a double shift!

media.title: The Dealer of Destruction!
media.description: Professor Kukui’s big announcement is making unexpected waves with unexpected people!

media.title: The Secret Princess!
media.description: An emotional look into the past reveals astounding people and places, and nothing will ever be the same again!

media.title: Drawn with the Wind!
media.description: Our heroes’ visit to a popular tourist attraction ends up being anything but a breeze!

media.title: Aiming for the Top Floor!
media.description: A second day in Malie City provides our heroes with a hard-earned chance for some unexpected excitement!

media.title: A High-Speed Awakening!
media.description: Sophocles may be excited to compete in a favorite race, but winning is about much more than coming in first!

media.title: The One That Didn’t Get Away!
media.description: What starts as an ordinary fishing expedition turns into a much bigger adventure than anyone could have imagined!

media.title: A Recipe for Success!
media.description: When Mallow sets out on a routine errand, little does she know she’ll return with much more than she ever dreamed of!

media.title: Spying for the Big Guy!
media.description: One of Team Rocket’s questionable claims comes back to haunt them when they’re paid a visit by Giovanni’s assistant Matori!

media.title: A Fiery Training Camp Trick!
media.description: Our heroes can’t wait to start training for the upcoming Alola Pokémon League, but not everyone is feeling confident!

media.title: Living on the Cutting Edge!
media.description: Objects are being cut into pieces all over Melemele Island, and the Ultra Guardians set out to investigate!

media.title: A Timeless Encounter!
media.description: An unexpected encounter with an unexpected Pokémon takes Ash on an adventure he’ll never forget!

media.title: Pikachu’s Exciting Adventure!
media.description: While Ash was caught up in an untimely adventure, his Pokémon were having quite an adventure of their own!

media.title: Chasing Memories, Creating Dreams!
media.description: The Alola Pokémon League is off to a rousing start, and emotions are running high in and out of Manalo Stadium!

media.title: League Offenders and Defenders!
media.description: The Alola Pokémon League is gearing up for a thrilling opening, but there seems to be trouble ahead…

media.title: Battle Royal 151!
media.description: The Alola Pokémon League is off to a rousing start with a Battle Royal competition among friends and rivals both old and new!

media.title: Battling Besties!
media.description: As the Alola Pokémon League marches on, friends and rivals alike give it their all!

media.title: The Battlefield of Truth and Love!
media.description: The Alola Pokémon League is in full swing, and there’s no shortage of surprises in store!

media.title: Imitation Is the Sincerest Form of Strategy!
media.description: As Ash and Rowlet prepare for their battle against Hau in the Alola Pokémon League, they get a little help from some old friends!

media.title: Battling on the Wing!
media.description: As the Alola Pokémon League quarterfinals continue, Ash and Rowlet’s battle against Hau and Decidueye takes plenty of twists and turns!

media.title: The Road to the Semifinals!
media.description: The Alola Pokémon League quarterfinals are wrapping up, and today’s event promises to be a wild ride!

media.title: The Final Four!
media.description: The first match of the Alola Pokémon League semifinals is up next, and the final four Trainers are determined to come out on top!

media.title: Getting Down to the Ire!
media.description: As the Alola Pokémon League nears the finals, the stakes are getting higher, and temperatures are rising to a fever pitch!

media.title: The Wisdom Not to Run!
media.description: The second round of the Alola Pokémon League semifinals is proceeding at a rapid pace, and there’s a lot more going on than meets the eye!

media.title: Final Rivals!
media.description: It’s time for the Alola Pokémon League finals, and the competitors are more determined than ever to become Champion!

media.title: Enter the Champion!
media.description: The Alola Pokémon League is down to the final moments of the final battle! Who will emerge victorious?

media.title: Z-Move Showdown!
media.description: Although the Alola Pokémon League is over, a new type of excitement is just beginning!

media.title: Exhibition Unmasked!
media.description: The Alola Pokémon League’s exhibition match is off to a fiery start—just as expected for a battle between Ash and the now-unmasked Masked Royal!

media.title: A Full Battle Bounty!
media.description: In the air or on the ground, the Alola Pokémon League’s exhibition match between Ash and Professor Kukui is roaring along!

media.title: Fiery Surprises!
media.description: The exhibition match between Ash and Professor Kukui continues with a long-awaited fiery showdown!

media.title: From Z to Shining Z!
media.description: Ash’s win at the Alola Pokémon League was astounding—but the resulting exhibition match has some colossal surprises in store, too!

media.title: Dreaming of the Sun and Moon!
media.description: Now that the Alola Pokémon League is over, it’s time for the Pokémon School class to make plans for their upcoming vacation!

media.title: Thank You, Alola! The Journey Continues!
media.description: With their big vacation on the horizon, our heroes are setting some life-changing plans into motion!

title: Pokémon Journeys: The Series
description: Ash and Pikachu’s exciting adventures continue with new friends and new Pokémon! Watch Pokémon Journeys: The Series on Pokémon TV today!

media.title: Enter Pikachu!
media.description: A series of past events set the stage for the friendships and adventures of the present!

media.title: Legend? Go! Friends? Go!
media.description: A visit to a brand-new research laboratory puts Ash on a path to meet a kindred spirit!

media.title: Ivysaur’s Mysterious Tower!
media.description: As Ash and Goh become accustomed to their new roles as research fellows for Professor Cerise, they find themselves surrounded by Pokémon mystery and wonder!

media.title: Settling the Scorbunny!
media.description: Ash and Goh visit the Galar region and meet a small Pokémon with a big heart!

media.title: Mind-Boggling Dynamax!
media.description: Ash and Goh search the Wild Area for giant Pokémon, and a little friend wants to join them!

media.title: Working My Way Back to Mew!
media.description: With Scorbunny by his side, Goh decides on a new goal—catch every kind of Pokémon!

media.title: Serving Up the Flute Cup!
media.description: Goh’s ambition may be to catch as many Pokémon as possible, but Ash wants to put some serious battling into the mix!

media.title: The Sinnoh Iceberg Race!
media.description: As Ash and Goh pursue their goals, they meet an exceptionally driven Pokémon with a big ambition of its own!

media.title: Finding a Legend!
media.description: When our heroes set off to investigate a rumor, finding a Legendary Pokémon becomes top priority!

media.title: A Test in Paradise!
media.description: Ash and Goh set out to find a special island spoken of in rumors—what kind of discoveries will they make?

media.title: Best Friend...Worst Nightmare!
media.description: An encounter with a frightening opponent gets resolved by a Pokémon who’s anything but frightening!

media.title: Flash of the Titans!
media.description: Thanks to Professor Cerise, our heroes are about to witness the battle of their lives!

media.title: The Climb to Be the Very Best!
media.description: After seeing Leon battle in the World Coronation Series, Ash knows just what he has to do!

media.title: Raid Battle in The Ruins!
media.description: Our heroes’ trip to the Unova region is filled with lots of twists and turns, and an unexpected surprise tops it off!

media.title: A Snow Day for Searching!
media.description: Some snowy weather gives Goh the opportunity to reunite with family and make a new friend!

media.title: A Chilling Curse!
media.description: What begins as a curse for our hero ends up being a wonderful surprise for all!

media.title: Kicking It from Here Into Tomorrow!
media.description: Goh and Scorbunny have different ideas about training—with unexpected results!

media.title: Destination: Coronation!
media.description: Ash is just starting out on the road to a rematch with Leon, but the action is already electrifying!

media.title: A Talent for Imitation!
media.description: A Ditto with a case of stage fright gets some help from the most unlikely of sources!

media.title: Dreams Are Made of These!
media.description: Professor Cerise has a big event planned, and our heroes are the key to its success!

media.title: Caring for a Mystery!
media.description: Intrigued by an unusual Pokémon Egg, Ash agrees to care for it—leading to even more excitement!

media.title: Goodbye, Friend!
media.description: Our heroes are doing research in Littleroot Town, and as usual, the results are anything but usual!

media.title: Panic in the Park!
media.description: Although Cerise Park is beautiful to behold, sometimes there’s trouble in paradise!

media.title: A Little Rocket R & R!
media.description: A day of rest and relaxation is anything but relaxing for Team Rocket!

media.title: A Festival Reunion!
media.description: As he rises in the World Coronation Series rankings, Ash finds himself facing an old friend and formidable opponent!

media.title: Splash, Dash, and Smash for the Crown! / Slowking's Crowning!
media.description: Some unusual events place our heroes among the wildest assortment of Trainers and Pokémon imaginable!

media.title: Toughing It Out!
media.description: A visit to a major battle event not only leads our heroes to new adventures, but to new friends as well!

media.title: Sobbing Sobble!
media.description: A chance encounter with a timid Pokémon brings out emotions in everybody!

media.title: There's a New Kid in Town!
media.description: Chloe and her family come together to help an injured Pokémon, but its recovery has unexpected side effects!

media.title: Betrayed, Bothered, and Beleaguered!
media.description: Ash gets caught up in some intensive special training, but not everyone is happy about it!

media.title: The Cuteness Quotient!
media.description: The bond between people and Pokémon can translate into spectacular magic!

media.title: Time After Time!
media.description: A family vacation takes Goh on a trip down memory lane!

media.title: Trade, Borrow, and Steal!
media.description: An encounter with an ardent Bug-type Trainer gives our heroes a chance for some up-close-and-personal Bug-type adventures!

media.title: Solitary and Menacing!
media.description: A World Coronation Series battle against Gym Leader Bea challenges Ash like never before!

media.title: Gotta Catch a What?!
media.description: Goh’s goal of catching one of every kind of Pokémon leads our heroes to an electrifying encounter!

media.title: Making Battles in the Sand!
media.description: Our heroes are determined to find out what’s inside a raging sandstorm—with lots of twists and turns along the way!

media.title: That New Old Gang of Mine!
media.description: Our heroes are off to Alola, and the Pokémon School gang has some surprises in store for them!

media.title: Restore and Renew!
media.description: A visit to the Pewter Museum of Science sets our heroes on an ancient and thrilling adventure!

media.title: Octo-Gridlock at the Gym!
media.description: Our heroes head to the Johto region so Ash can have a rematch with Bea!

media.title: A Crackling Raid Battle!
media.description: Our heroes are hot on the trail of a Legendary Pokémon and the answer to a mystery!

media.title: Pikachu Translation Check… Up to Your Neck!
media.description: It’s an unusual day for everyone: heroes and foes alike!

media.title: Sword and Shield, Slumbering Weald!
media.description: Dynamax Pokémon are rampaging in Galar, and our heroes are hot on the trail of discovery!

media.title: Sword and Shield: The Darkest Day!
media.description: Approaching the crisis in Galar from different perspectives, our heroes are determined to find answers!

media.title: Sword and Shield: From Here to Eternatus!
media.description: As the Galar region faces possible destruction, our heroes are determined to prevent that from happening!

media.title: Sword and Shield…The Legends Awaken!
media.description: Our heroes face a challenge of unfathomable proportions, and the fate of Galar hangs in the balance!

media.title: Getting More Than You Battled For!
media.description: As Ash and Goh explore a distant island in search of Mew, their research takes an unexpected, powerful turn!

media.title: Crowning the Chow Crusher!
media.description: There’s a big competition in Vermilion City, and heroes and villains alike are digging in to win!

media.title: A Close Call… Practically!
media.description: As Ash and Goh enjoy their eatery tour in Unova, two of their Pokémon bond in ways they never dreamed!

title: Pokémon Master Journeys: The Series
description: Watch Ash and Goh’s adventures in Pokémon Master Journeys: The Series on Pokémon TV.

media.title: To Train, or Not to Train!
media.description: As Chloe takes her time deciding whether to become a Pokémon Trainer, it turns out her decision is right in front of her!

media.title: A Pinch of This, a Pinch of That!
media.description: Ash and Goh have always been fascinated with all kinds of Pokémon, and now Chloe is joining them on their latest adventure!

media.title: Trials of a Budding Master!
media.description: Ash wants to improve his World Coronation Series ranking, and there’s only one way to do it: by battling!

media.title: How Are You Gonna Keep ‘Em Off of the Farm?
media.description: A visit to a vegetable farm has our heroes researching Pokémon in a most surprising way!

media.title: Healing the Healer!
media.description: A Legendary Pokémon is in trouble, and our heroes are there to help as best as they can!

media.title: Sobble Spies A Stealthy Strategy!
media.description: When our heroes visit a movie set, Sobble’s outlook on battling undergoes a transformation!

media.title: The Tale of You and Glimwood Tangle!
media.description: A fascinating book inspires Chloe to take on an equally fascinating mission!

media.title: Searching for Chivalry!
media.description: Ash and Farfetch’d want to hone their leek-wielding skills, and there’s a place in Kalos where they can do just that!

media.title: Memories of A Warming Kindness!
media.description: A snowy day provides an opportunity to relive fond memories and forge new ones, too!

media.title: A Rollicking Roll… Eyes on the Goal!
media.description: There are always plenty of adventures to go around: for people and Pokémon!

media.title: When a House is Not a Home!
media.description: Goh finds a Grookey who’s been separated from its Trainer, but things are not as simple as they seem!

media.title: Beyond Chivalry… Aiming to be a Leek Master!
media.description: Ash is working hard to reach his goal of battling Leon, so it’s time for another World Coronation Series match!

media.title: Searching for Service with a Smile!
media.description: Ash and Goh meet some workers in need of assistance, so they jump right in and help!

media.title: Not Too Close for Comfort!
media.description: An unexpected Evolution brings back an unexpected memory for Goh!

media.title: On Land, In the Sea, and to the Future!
media.description: A meeting with a Vaporeon Trainer has Chloe thinking about Eevee’s future!

media.title: Absol Absolved!
media.description: A request from a friend has our heroes off to save the day!

media.title: Thrash of the Titans!
media.description: An invitation from an old friend has Ash really excited and looking toward the Pokémon World Coronation Series with renewed determination!

media.title: Under Color of Darkness!
media.description: Our heroes are on a mission to help a diminutive Pokémon in distress!

media.title: Sleuths for Truth!
media.description: A rash of wrongdoing is gripping Vermilion City, but our heroes are there to crack the case!

media.title: Advice to Goh!
media.description: Goh has a big decision to make, and Ash’s first rival is here to help!

media.title: Errand Endurance!
media.description: When Grookey and Eevee run their first errand, it becomes a learning experience for everyone!

media.title: Take My Thief! Please!
media.description: Team Rocket has a big decision to make, and their food supply depends on it!

media.title: Leaping Toward the Dream!
media.description: Goh’s first test for Project Mew awaits—along with some very challenging situations!

media.title: Everybody’s Doing the Underground Shuffle!
media.description: Unexpected alliances form when our heroes and Team Rocket get mixed up underground!

media.title: Grabbing the Brass Ring!
media.description: A trip to the Galar region has Ash and Goh doing some surprising research about Pokémon teamwork!

media.title: Nightfall? Nightmares!
media.description: A series of mysterious events are occurring in Sinnoh, so our heroes are off to investigate!

media.title: A Midsummer Night's Light!
media.description: A legendary conflict unfolds as our heroes investigate the source of nightmares in the Sinnoh region!

media.title: All Out, All of the Time!
media.description: When Ash and Goh enter a race in Alola, the other competitors go all out to make it a challenge!

media.title: Ultra Exciting from the Shocking Start!
media.description: It’s time for Ash’s first Ultra Class battle, and the competition is formidable indeed!

media.title: Detective Drizzile!
media.description: Cerise Laboratory’s research data has been deleted, and everyone is determined to find out why!

media.title: Night and Day, You are the Ones!
media.description: An encounter with some remarkable people and Pokémon gives Chloe and Eevee some valuable life lessons!

media.title: Trial on a Golden Scale!
media.description: Goh’s first trial mission for Project Mew is about to begin, and it promises to deliver a host of surprises!

media.title: Mad About Blue!
media.description: After Goh catches a rare Pokémon, our heroes meet some unusual people with some fascinating, blue interests!

media.title: The Sweet Taste of Battle!
media.description: Our heroes take on a challenge that gives the word “sweet” new meaning!

media.title: Star Night, Star Flight!
media.description: Ash and Goh visit a town in a difficult situation involving the difference between night and day!

media.title: An Adventure of Mega Proportions!
media.description: Korrina and Gurkinn take our heroes to Mega Island, where Ash and Lucario face an unexpected test!

media.title: Battle Three With Bea!
media.description: Determined to advance in the World Coronation Series, Ash and Bea battle in the Ultra Class!

media.title: A Battle of Mega Versus Max!
media.description: Ash’s battle against Bea develops into a full-throttled competition where the victor is anyone’s guess!

media.title: Breaking the Ice!
media.description: A new classmate at Chloe and Goh’s school has a Glaceon with an icy disposition!

media.title: Looking out for Number Two!
media.description: Continuing his quest to join Project Mew, Goh faces his second trial mission!

media.title: The Gates of Warp!
media.description: A mysterious phenomenon pulls our heroes into uncharted territory!

media.title: Showdown at the Gates of Warp!
media.description: Confronted with an unexpected reality, our heroes team up with some unexpected allies!

title: Pokémon Ultimate Journeys: The Series
description: Ash, Goh, and Chloe chase their dreams as Pokémon Trainers as their adventures continue.

title: Pokémon: The First Movie
description: Watch Ash and his friends confront the powerful Legendary Pokémon Mewtwo in Pokémon: The First Movie, now on Pokémon TV!

media.title: Pokémon: The First Movie
media.description: Team Rocket leader Giovanni hires a scientist to leverage his knowledge of cloning to create a living weapon. That weapon, a Pokémon named Mewtwo, is furious at being used by humanity. Ash, Pikachu, and their friends try to stop Mewtwo’s path of destruction and prove that people and Pokémon are defined by their choices, not their origin.

title: Pokémon the Movie 2000
description: Ash and Pikachu must restore balance when a collector attempts to awaken the Legendary Pokémon Lugia as Pokémon the Movie 2000 comes to Pokémon TV.

media.title: Pokémon the Movie 2000
media.description: The balance of the environment is disrupted when a Pokémon collector captures Articuno, Zapdos, and Moltres in an attempt to awaken Lugia. Ash and Pikachu must battle to stop this wicked scheme and rescue the Legendary Pokémon.

title: Pokémon 3: The Movie
description: Entei and the Unown want to make a girl’s dreams come true, but some dreams become nightmares in Pokémon 3: The Movie on Pokémon TV.

media.title: Pokémon 3: The Movie
media.description: The Unknown Spells Adventure.

title: Pokémon: Lucario and the Mystery of Mew
description: Ash must convince a recently reawakened Lucario to help rescue Pikachu from a mischievous Mew in Pokémon: Lucario and the Mystery of Mew on Pokémon TV.

media.title: Pokémon: Lucario and the Mystery of Mew
media.description: When Ash inadvertently summons a Lucario from long ago, he must convince the embittered Pokémon to become a hero and help rescue Pikachu from a mischievous Mew.

title: Pokémon Ranger and the Temple of the Sea
description: Ash teams up with a Pokémon Ranger and Manaphy to save the Sea Crown from a thieving pirate in Pokémon Ranger and the Temple of the Sea on Pokémon TV.

media.title: Pokémon Ranger and the Temple of the Sea
media.description: Ash and friends join forces with a Pokémon Ranger and Manaphy to stop a greedy pirate from pillaging the valuable Sea Crown.

title: Pokémon: The Rise of Darkrai
description: Darkrai, Dialga, and Palkia offer a puzzle for Ash in Pokémon: The Rise of Darkrai, now available on Pokémon TV.

media.title: Pokémon: The Rise of Darkrai
media.description: Somewhere Between Time and Space... A Legend Is Born.

title: Pokémon: Giratina & the Sky Warrior
description: Ash teams up with the Mythical Pokémon Shaymin to counter Giratina’s might in Pokémon: Giratina & the Sky Warrior.

media.title: Pokémon: Giratina & the Sky Warrior
media.description: In a Reverse World, a Legendary Battle Rages On…

title: Pokémon: Arceus and the Jewel of Life
description: Ash and friends travel to the past to fix mistakes that threaten the present in Pokémon: Arceus and the Jewel of Life.

media.title: Pokémon: Arceus and the Jewel of Life
media.description: A Tale Untold. A Legend Unleashed.

title: Pokémon—Zoroark: Master of Illusions
description: Ash, Pikachu, Dawn, and Piplup race to rescue Zoroark and Crown City from a power-hungry media mogul.

media.title: Pokémon—Zoroark: Master of Illusions
media.description: The Fury of Zoroark Has Been Unleashed!

description: Legendary and Mythical Pokémon from Unova Shine on Pokémon TV

media.description: The Courage of a Hero's Truth

description: When a plot to use Victini’s power threatens a town, Ash calls on Reshiram and Zekrom to help save the day. See the action on Pokémon TV!

media.description: The Power of a Hero's Ideals

title: Pokémon the Movie: Kyurem vs. The Sword of Justice
description: The Mythical Pokémon Keldeo needs Ash’s help to rescue its friends in Pokémon the Movie: Kyurem vs. The Sword of Justice.

media.title: Pokémon the Movie: Kyurem vs. The Sword of Justice
media.description: Ash, Pikachu, and their friends join the Mythical Pokémon Keldeo in its mission to rescue Cobalion, Terrakion, and Virizion from Kyurem. Can our heroes stop the Legendary Pokémon’s rampage?

title: Pokémon the Movie: Genesect and the Legend Awakened
description: Don’t snooze on Pokémon the Movie: Genesect and the Legend Awakened on Pokémon TV!

media.description: The arrival of five Genesect at a Pokémon habitat in Pokémon Hills threatens the city’s power supply. With help from the Legendary Pokémon Mewtwo, Ash and his friends must work together to find a solution that will protect the city and the Pokémon that live there.

title: Pokémon the Movie: Diancie and the Cocoon of Destruction

media.title: Pokémon the Movie: Diancie and the Cocoon of Destruction
media.description: When Destruction rises, can Life prevail?

title: Pokémon the Movie: Hoopa and the Clash of Ages
description: An ancient threat is in danger of breaking loose, and only Ash and his friends can help in Pokémon the Movie: Hoopa and the Clash of Ages.

media.title: Pokémon the Movie: Hoopa and the Clash of Ages
media.description: Ash and his friends learn that a threat that’s been bottled up for years is now in danger of breaking loose again. How does this dark power connect to the Mythical Pokémon Hoopa?

title: Pokémon the Movie: Volcanion and the Mechanical Marvel
description: Bond with Ash and Volcanion as they team up to rescue Magearna in Pokémon the Movie: Volcanion and the Mechanical Marvel.

media.title: Pokémon the Movie: Volcanion and the Mechanical Marvel
media.description: After falling from the sky, the Mythical Pokémon Volcanion is mysteriously bound to Ash. Together with Serena, Clemont, Bonnie, and their Pokémon, they must rescue Magearna from a wicked scheme.

title: Pokémon the Movie: I Choose You!
description: Ash and Pikachu’s journey is just beginning as they search for the Legendary Ho-Oh.

media.title: Pokémon the Movie: I Choose You!
media.description: Ash Ketchum oversleeps on his tenth birthday, and Pikachu becomes his first partner Pokémon as a result. After a rocky start to their friendship, a glimpse of the rare Legendary Rainbow Pokémon inspires the pair to set out on a mission to encounter it again.

title: Pokémon the Movie: The Power of Us
description: Ash confronts Zeraora while helping to unite a city against a potential threat in Pokémon the Movie: The Power of Us.

media.title: Pokémon the Movie: The Power of Us
media.description: Ash and Pikachu meet a colorful cast of characters when they arrive in Fula City during the annual Wind Festival. When a series of threats endangers the city, they must all work together to save the day.

title: Pokémon: Mewtwo Strikes Back—Evolution
description: Ash and friends must stop Mewtwo from seeking revenge against its creators in Pokémon: Mewtwo Strikes Back—Evolution.

media.title: Pokémon: Mewtwo Strikes Back—Evolution
media.description: In this CGI reimagining of the original Pokémon animated movie, Ash, Pikachu, and their friends must confront Mewtwo, a Legendary Pokémon seeking revenge against its human creators.

title: Pokémon the Movie: Secrets of the Jungle
description: Ash befriends a boy who’s been raised in the jungle by the Mythical Pokémon Zarude in Pokémon the Movie: Secrets of the Jungle.

media.title: Pokémon the Movie: Secrets of the Jungle
media.description: Ash befriends Koko, a boy who has been raised deep in the jungle by the Mythical Pokémon Zarude. When the jungle is threatened, the bonds between Pokémon and humans are put to the test.

media.title: Episode 1: The Adventure
media.description: From Viridian Forest to Terminus Cave, see the Pokémon world as never before!

media.title: Episode 2: The Chase
media.description: Detective Looker of the International Police uncovers critical information in the hunt for Team Rocket Boss Giovanni.

media.title: Episode 3: The Challenger
media.description: A new challenger approaches to test his abilities against the Kanto region’s Elite Four. Will he prove himself worthy?

media.title: Episode 4: The Lake of Rage
media.description: With rumors of a Red Gyarados rampaging in the Lake of Rage, Lance of the Elite Four decides to investigate.

media.title: Episode 5: The Legacy
media.description: In the wake of Team Rocket’s takeover of the Goldenrod Radio Tower, Detective Looker’s investigation leads him to an enigmatic young Trainer.

media.title: Episode 6: The Reawakening
media.description: The mysterious traveler Eusine explores the legends of Ecruteak City’s Burned Tower and the Pokémon who rose from its ashes.

media.title: Episode 7: The Vision
media.description: When an uninvited guest breaks into their headquarters, Team Magma must race against time to make their ambitions a reality.

media.title: Episode 8: The Cavern
media.description: Deep under the sea, Team Aqua’s leader is about to achieve his greatest goal. Can one voice of reason turn the tide of destruction?

media.title: Episode 9: The Scoop
media.description: While the Hoenn region rejoices after avoiding meteoric destruction, reporter Gabby and her cameraman Ty uncover the story of a lifetime.

media.title: Episode 10: The Old Chateau
media.description: Late at night, a young traveler and her Chansey lose their way in Eterna Forest. They soon stumble upon a house—but what waits inside?

media.title: Episode 11: The New World
media.description: With the beginnings of a new universe laid out before him, Cyrus of Team Galactic faces extreme opposition. But aid arrives in an unusual form.

media.title: Episode 12: The Magma Stone
media.description: The remnants of Team Galactic have awakened Heatran deep within Stark Mountain. Who can stop their burning ambitions from erupting into catastrophe?

media.title: Episode 13: The Uprising
media.description: With the ascension of their king and the fall of the Pokémon League, Team Plasma is poised to take control—until the Gym Leaders arrive!

media.title: Episode 14: The Frozen World
media.description: Gym Leader Drayden prepares to defend Opelucid City against Team Plasma, but the true nature of their plans will chill him to his very core.

media.title: Episode 15: The King Returns
media.description: His plans left in ruins, Ghetsis makes one last attempt to bring Unova under his icy grasp. A hero arrives, intending to stop him.

media.title: Episode 16: The Beauty Eternal
media.description: Scientist. Entrepreneur. Visionary. Take a closer look at the man whose acts have redefined the Kalos region: Lysandre.

media.title: Episode 17: The Investigation
media.description: Detective Looker’s assistants Emma and Mimi have been helping him out in Lumiose City, until a crime wave threatens to tear them apart.

media.title: Episode 18: The Redemption
media.description: A new champion rises. An ancient king returns. A sorrow that has lasted 3,000 years is brought to an end.

media.title: File 1: Red
media.description: Red, along with his rival Blue, sets out on a quest to realize Professor Oak’s dream of completing the Pokédex.

media.title: File 2: Cubone
media.description: Red encounters a place called the Pokémon House, where he learns of a baby Cubone’s ordeal at the hands of an evil organization known as Team Rocket.

media.title: File 3: Giovanni
media.description: Red arrives in Saffron City to find Team Rocket’s fingerprints on everything, but what lies in store at Viridian City may be the biggest surprise yet.

media.title: File 4: Charizard
media.description: After defeating the Elite Four, Red is finally ready to challenge the Champion and take his strength to the next level.

title: Pokémon: Twilight Wings
description: Leon visits the Isle of Armor in The Gathering of Stars, a special new episode of Pokémon: Twilight Wings, now on Pokémon TV!

media.title: Episode 1: Letter
media.description: The initial chapter of the new seven-episode animated series set in the Galar region is now available for you to enjoy.

media.title: Episode 2: Training
media.description: After losing to Galar’s Champion, Leon, Fighting-type Gym Leader Bea sets out with her Pokémon to elevate their training. Will she find her inner resolve and grow stronger, or will she succumb to the pressure of defeat?

media.title: Episode 3: Buddy
media.description: Hop idolizes his older brother, Leon, who along with his partner Pokémon, Charizard, have earned the title of Champion. Wooloo, Hop’s partner Pokémon, is jealous of the admiration shown for Leon’s Charizard and decides to prove that it’s also worthy of the Champion title.

media.title: Episode 4: Early-Evening Waves
media.description: Nessa, an incredibly popular Gym Leader and model, has always strived to be the best. Her focus is split between the two professions, and Chairman Rose advises her to choose one path or the other if she truly wants to be number one. Will she sacrifice one dream in pursuit of the other?

media.title: Episode 5: Assistant
media.description: There’s never a moment’s rest for Oleana as she solves problems big and small to keep Galar running smoothly. But sometimes a break puts everything back in perspective and reminds us why we do what we do.

media.title: Episode 6: Moonlight
media.description: After getting into an argument with his friend John, Tommy wants to make amends. He enlists Allister, Galar’s Ghost-type Gym Leader, to help in a most unusual way.

media.title: Episode 7: Sky
media.description: The day of Leon’s Championship match has arrived, and thanks to John’s letter, all the kids at the hospital are invited to attend! But in his excitement, John oversleeps and almost misses his chance to go to the stadium. Will he be able to make it to the battle in time?

media.title: Pokémon: Twilight Wings—The Gathering of Stars
media.description: Leon heads to the Isle of Armor to meet with his former mentor, Mustard, and ask for his support. By gathering star Trainers from across Galar, he’ll create a tournament unlike any other!

title: Pokémon Evolutions
description: Watch the limited series to take a bold new look at the people and Pokémon of the many regions of the Pokémon world.

media.title: Episode 1: The Champion
media.description: What goes through the mind of a Pokémon Champion as they prepare to face the greatest challenge of all? Doubts? Regrets? Determination? All three?

media.title: Episode 2: The Eclipse
media.description: As the sun sets on some painful memories, Lillie vows to rescue her mother and bring back her friend Nebby. But, in her moment of triumph, a sinister presence casts a shadow on their moonlit reunion…

media.title: Episode 3: The Visionary
media.description: What do you do when everyone tells you you’re wrong for what you think? Do you stop and listen? Or do you follow your vision no matter the cost, even if it risks the people and Pokémon of Kalos?

media.title: Episode 4: The Plan
media.description: He thought of everything as he plotted and schemed behind the scenes. He manipulated people and Pokémon as each piece of his plan for Unova fell into place exactly as intended.

media.title: Episode 5: The Rival
media.description: Rivals. No matter how fast you run through Sinnoh, they’re always one step ahead, driving you to be better. But at some point, whoever they are, you must stop to face them and their Pokémon.

media.title: Episode 6: The Wish
media.description: All her life, she’s been told the story of her people, bound to their wishes and to her duty to Hoenn. Lorekeeper Zinnia has always known what she has to do…but when the Legendary Pokémon Rayquaza arrives, will she have what it takes?

media.title: Episode 7: The Show
media.description: We raise the curtain on the Kimono Girls as they perform a tale of the Legendary Pokémon of Johto in a magical storytelling experience you’ll never forget!

media.title: Episode 8: The Discovery
media.description: It started as a whisper that became a rumor. Now everyone is talking about it—the most powerful Pokémon ever has been discovered in Kanto! And Green, Pokémon Trainer extraordinaire, is racing to catch it. But she’s not the only one....

title: Bidoof’s Big Stand
description: Look out! Bidoof bumbles into trouble in the new animated short Bidoof’s Big Stand. Catch the adventure now!

media.title: Bidoof's Big Stand
media.description: A bumbling Bidoof with a tendency to bite off more than it can chew finds itself between a rock and a hard place as it embarks on a journey to find its place in the world.

title: Pokémon: Hisuian Snow
description: A young boy befriends a Hisuian Zorua despite his father’s wishes in Pokémon: Hisuian Snow. Watch the limited animated series now!

media.title: Onto the Icy Blue
media.description: Alec returns to the Hisui region to visit his father. There, he recalls events from his childhood when he encountered a wild Pokémon in a snow-covered forest...

media.title: Fiery Reflections in Snow
media.description: After falling down a cliffside, young Alec befriends the Hisuian Zorua, and they work together to climb back up. But when Alec returns to his father, he's surprised at his father's reaction upon seeing the Zorua.

media.title: Two Hues
media.description: After many years, Alec returns to the Hisui region to collect the medicinal plants he learned about as a child...and maybe see an old friend.

title: POKÉTOON
description: From heartwarming to silly, the POKÉTOON series of animated shorts has Pokémon fun for all moods!

media.title: Scraggy and Mimikyu
media.description: On the hunt for some tasty Poké Beans, Scraggy runs into a peculiar Pokémon—Mimikyu! Mimikyu wants to be friends, but Scraggy only wants snacks. Watch as they chase each other toward a potential friendship.

media.title: The Pancham Who Wants to Be a Hero
media.description: Pancham dreams of becoming a hero, so it trains every day. When some people and Pokémon are in trouble, does Pancham have what it takes to be the hero they need?

media.title: Blossom’s Dream
media.description: Blossom’s goal is to become a Pokémon League Champion! During a trip into the forest, she has a chance encounter with a Pokémon who will test her dreams.

media.title: Wait for Me, Magikarp!
media.description: A loyal Magikarp wants nothing more than to make a friend.

media.title: The Slugma-Powered Home
media.description: Spend a cozy, snowy day in a house full of friendly Pokémon.

media.title: Help! I’ve Turned into a Gengar
media.description: Afterschool activities get more interesting when a mysterious Gengar stirs up some fun.

media.title: Snorunt’s Summer Vacation
media.description: A hot summer day suddenly turns into a snowy wonderland for three friends. Could a Pokémon have something to do with it?

media.title: Jigglypuff’s Song
media.description: Jigglypuff is sad because its song isn’t like the songs of other Jigglypuff. Will it be able to find the right melody with a friend’s help?

title: Pokémon: Path to the Peak
description: Ava feels out of place at her new school until she discovers the Pokémon Trading Card Game in this four-part animated series.

media.title: Ep. 1 - The Club
media.description: Forced to move from her old town, Ava makes a fresh start and sets out on a new adventure with the school’s Pokémon TCG club.

media.title: Ep. 2 - Regionals
media.description: With a battle against Celestine looming, Ava rises to the challenge and enters to compete at the Regional Championships.

media.title: Ep. 3 - Internationals
media.description: After a major upset at Regionals, Ava continues her journey on the path of the Pokémon Championship Series at International Championships.

media.title: Ep. 4 - Worlds
media.description: Emotionally defeated, Ava fights to rediscover her drive to compete with the support of her family and friends.

media.title: The Muffin Man
media.description: Pikachu is walking on the street with a basket of muffin in its hands. The sweet smell of the muffin attracts many Pokémon along the way! Look forward to who Pikachu will meet and let's sing along together!

media.title: Ten in the Bed
media.description: Pichu and friends are taking a nap together, but it seems like Pichu is having trouble sleeping...? Let's sing along and learn the numbers!

media.title: 7 Steps
media.description: Pikachu went on a journey and met with different Pokémon. How many Pokémon did Pikachu meet? Let's count together and learn the numbers!

media.title: Happy Pika-Pika Holiday
media.description: Happy Pika Pika Holiday! Let's get into the holiday mood and have fun together with Pikachu & Eevee!

media.title: The More We Get Together
media.description: Litten visits a colorful playground and makes many new friends.  The more they get together, the more fun they get! Let's join them and sing along to this classic nursery rhyme song!

media.title: I’m a Little Teapot
media.description: Pikachu and friends are preparing for a tea party! While making the tea, the Indeedee notice that something is missing. Can they find what they need to complete the tea?

media.title: Hickory Dickory Dock
media.description: A Togepi got separated from its friends! Can Pikachu help it reunite with them?

media.title: Row, Row, Row Your Boat
media.description: Curious about what’s at the end of the river, Sobble and Popplio decide to take a boat ride. Who will they meet during the journey?

media.title: Pokémon Spelling Song 2 (BINGO AGAIN)
media.description: It seems like a Pokémon is hiding inside a fan! Can you guess its name? Let’s learn the alphabet together with Pokémon!

media.title: Who Took the Cookies?
media.description: Oh no! All the cookies in the jar are gone! Let’s find out which Pokémon took them all.

media.title: Pokémon Spelling Song (BINGO)
media.description: There are a lot of Pokémon playing inside and outside the house. Do you know how to spell all their names? Let’s learn the alphabet together with Pokémon!

media.title: Mary Had a Little Lamb
media.description: Mareep and Pikachu are such great friends that they always have fun together, no matter where they find themselves!

media.title: Flea Waltz
media.description: Listen to the familiar tune: it’s one of those songs heard around the world, but it goes by different names, like “Flea Waltz,” “Cat’s Polka,” “Chopsticks,” “La Chocolatera,” and “Neko Funjatta”!

media.title: Flight of Mewtwo
media.description: Follow Mewtwo as it flies over stunning landmarks, mountains, and seas. This is a feast for the eyes as well as the ears! Music: “Pomp and Circumstance” preceded by excerpts from “Orpheus in the Underworld”

media.title: The Wheels on the Bus
media.description: Ride along with Pikachu and friends as they take a trip all through the town! Sing along and have a fun ride!

media.title: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
media.description: Watch these stars of the Pokémon world as they shine in the night sky! Sing along and have electrifying moments with everyone!

media.title: Old MacDonald Had a Farm
media.description: When Ludicolo and Eevee are running a farm of their own, things never get dull. Sing along and have fun with the frolicking friends of the farm!

media.title: Happy and You Know It
media.description: When you can’t hide your happiness, go sing and dance with Pokémon friends! Clap your hands! Stomp your feet! Jump!

media.title: Radio Taiso Number One (Japanese Warm-Up Exercise)
media.description: Radio Taiso Number One! Pikachu and Lucario are doing Radio Taiso, a warm-up exercise that is popular in Japan. As Lucario and friends continue to exercise, the surrounding is becoming more and more lively...?

media.title: Machamp Workout
media.description: It’s time for our daily Machamp exercise routine! Make good use of all four of your arms to break a sweat and have a splendid Pokémon day!

media.title: Jigglypuff’s Mini Concert
media.description: Jigglypuff is looking for something in the forest, but it’s not having much luck. Ditto sees that Jigglypuff is sad, so it decides to transform into something. Let’s see what Ditto transforms into!

media.title: Wooper, Let's Tidy Up!
media.description: The three Wooper were also playing energetically today! But when they had finished playing, toys were scattered all over the room... Ditto tidied up the room again and again, but there was no end in sight! Ditto decided to transform into a musical instrument! What is it? Can you guess?

media.title: Pokémon at Your Fingertips!
media.description: Get ready to meet Pokémon in fun new ways! Place your finger on the screen, and imagine what it feels like to play with your Pokémon friends. Try it on both smartphones and tablets!

media.title: ASMR: Bulbasaur in the Woods
media.description: ASMR is a soothing sound that is comfortable to listen to. Relax with Bulbasaur while it tries to find the perfect spot for a peaceful rest. (Wearing headphones is recommended!)

media.title: ASMR: Charmander’s Fireside Slumber
media.description: ASMR is a soothing sound that is comfortable to listen to. Relax with a sleepy Charmander. (Wearing headphones is recommended!)

media.title: ASMR: Squirtle’s Day at the Beach
media.description: ASMR is a soothing sound that is comfortable to listen to. Have a relaxing day at the beach with Squirtle! (Wearing headphones is recommended!)

media.title: Good Night, Rowlet
media.description: Ditto transformed into a stone and took a nap. When it woke up, it was surprised to find Rowlet sleeping on top of it! See what Ditto does next!

media.title: Pokémon Lovely Meadows
media.description: While Pikachu was exploring, it came across a group of Patrat keeping watch over the meadow. Let’s join the fun and see what the Patrat are looking out for!

media.title: Let’s Count Wooloo
media.description: Listen to a lullaby as Wooloo jump over the fence.

media.title: Pikachu, Piplup, and the Playful Clay!
media.description: Pikachu and Piplup come across some mysterious clay. Let’s watch and see what they do with it!

media.title: Rolling Poké Balls: Sinnoh Region
media.description: Feel the rhythm and follow along to see if your favorite Pokémon is inside one of the rolling Poké Balls!

media.title: Rolling Poké Balls: Kanto
media.description: Feel the rhythm and follow along to see if your favorite Pokémon is inside one of the rolling Poké Balls!

media.title: Fill in the Donut
media.description: The shapes look familiar... Oh! They’re Pokémon! Can you guess which Pokémon each shape is?

media.title: Pikachu’s Morning Routine
media.description: Take a look at a Pikachu’s morning and find out what kind of routine it goes through.

media.title: Pokémon Sports Day
media.description: It’s Pokémon Sports Day! Watch Pokémon compete in various games such as foot races, ball tossing, tug-of-war, and jump rope!

media.title: Pikachu vs. Eevee — Relay Race
media.description: Teams of Pikachu and Eevee are giving their best in a relay race. Which team do you think will win the match? Let’s cheer for both of them!

media.title: Pokémon Chase!
media.description: Help Eevee track and find its Pokémon friends in a variety of areas.

media.title: Pikachu vs. Eevee: Roll the Ball
media.description: Heave-ho! Pikachu and Eevee are determined to roll the giant ball! Who do you think will reach the finish line first?

media.title: Pokémon Peek-a-boo!
media.description: Can you spot the hiding Pokémon?

media.title: Pikachu vs. Eevee: Balloon Popping
media.description: Pikachu and Eevee are ready for a friendly balloon-popping match! Let's cheer them both on!

media.title: Great March of Pokémon
media.description: Pokémon don’t seem to mind marching along if it’s to a fun tune like this!

media.title: Rolling Poké Balls
media.description: Feel the rhythm and follow along to see if your favorite Pokémon is inside one of the rolling Poké Balls!

media.title: Rolling Poké Balls 2
media.description: Feel the rhythm and follow along to see if your favorite Pokémon is inside one of the rolling Poké Balls!

media.title: Rolling Poké Balls 3
media.description: Feel the rhythm and follow along to see if your favorite Pokémon is inside one of the rolling Poké Balls!

media.title: Rolling Poké Balls 4
media.description: Feel the rhythm and follow along to see if your favorite Pokémon is inside one of the rolling Poké Balls!

media.title: Spot the Pokémon
media.description: Watch how Pikachu and Pelipper search for and find their fellow Pokémon!

media.title: Mysterious Ghost Manor
media.description: Join Mimikyu as it explores a manor filled with spooky, scary Pokémon!

media.title: Lovely Clefairy
media.description: A catchy Pokémon song featuring Clefairy. Try listening to it and you might sway side to side together with this cute Pokémon!

media.title: Dance Around
media.description: Inside a mysterious castle, Pikachu, Meditite, and Medicham gather and start dancing. Let’s join them—see if you can keep up with the dance!

media.title: Pokémon Thrilling Halloween -Trick or Treat-
media.description: It’s Halloween, and Pikachu and Eevee are heading into the forest to gather candy. On their way, they manage to gather not only candy, but also new friends!

media.title: When I Call Your Name
media.description: A Pokémon Kids TV original song featuring Dedenne, Pikachu, Mime Jr., Smeargle, and Ludicolo! Try calling out their names and see what happens! Let’s sing and have fun together with Pikachu and friends!

media.title: What Color?
media.description: What color are the berries that these Pokémon like? Red, Yellow, Blue? Let's learn colors together with Pokémon!

media.title: Open Shut Them
media.description: This is the Pokémon version of the popular nursery rhyme "Open Shut Them"—let's sing along together and try to guess who each Pokémon is!

media.title: One Pikachu
media.description: It’s a Pokémon version of the popular nursery rhyme “I Am the Music Man”! Let’s sing and dance together with Pikachu! Can you count how many Pikachu are in the video?

media.title: Walking Walking (Eevee Version)
media.description: A walking song with Pokémon! Join Pikachu, Eevee, and the Eevee Evolutions for a walk, and sing along with them!

media.title: Pokémon Smile! Brush Your Teeth Song
media.description: Brush your teeth along with all your favorite Pokémon!

media.title: Pi-Pi-Pi-Pi Pikachu!
media.description: Are you ready for some Pika-charm? Let’s sing and dance together!

media.title: Scorbunny Dancing
media.description: Sing and dance along with Scorbunny!

media.title: Deck the Halls
media.description: Our Pokémon friends are so eager to help when it comes to putting up holiday decorations.

media.title: Jingle Bells
media.description: Sing along and get into the holiday spirit! A sleigh ride is fun, but it’s even more fun when Pokémon are with you to Jingle Bell the night away!

media.title: Happy Birthday to You
media.description: Throwing a party isn't an easy job, but singing the Happy Birthday song will be!  Make someone's birthday even happier by singing along!

media.title: I Love Pikachu and Eevee - Dance
media.description: Your partners Pikachu and Eevee have been making you sing, sing, sing, but don’t forget to dance while you’re still in the mood!

media.title: Pokémon Lulling Lullaby
media.description: See if the quirky music and cavalcade of Pokémon mesmerize you and lull you to sleep. You can be sure it will make these little Pokémon sleepy!

media.title: Halloween! Halloween!
media.description: You’ve been invited to a party on a full moon night. Get into the Halloween mood and dance along with your Pokémon friends!

media.title: Halloween! Halloween! - Dance
media.description: You’ve been invited to a party on a full moon night. Get into the Halloween mood and dance along with your Pokémon friends!

media.title: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
media.description: Watch these stars of the Pokémon world as they shine in the night sky! Sing along and have electrifying moments with everyone!

media.title: Pokémon Lulling Lullaby
media.description: See if the quirky music and cavalcade of Pokémon mesmerize you and lull you to sleep. You can be sure it will make these little Pokémon sleepy!

media.title: ASMR: Bulbasaur in the Woods
media.description: ASMR is a soothing sound that is comfortable to listen to. Relax with Bulbasaur while it tries to find the perfect spot for a peaceful rest. (Wearing headphones is recommended!)

media.title: ASMR: Charmander’s Fireside Slumber
media.description: ASMR is a soothing sound that is comfortable to listen to. Relax with a sleepy Charmander. (Wearing headphones is recommended!)

media.title: ASMR: Squirtle’s Day at the Beach
media.description: ASMR is a soothing sound that is comfortable to listen to. Have a relaxing day at the beach with Squirtle! (Wearing headphones is recommended!)

media.title: Good Night, Rowlet
media.description: Ditto transformed into a stone and took a nap. When it woke up, it was surprised to find Rowlet sleeping on top of it! See what Ditto does next!

media.title: Let’s Count Wooloo
media.description: Listen to a lullaby as Wooloo jump over the fence.
